1.content: To better divide the pokemon into categories, please select the type of evolution they undergo.
1.title: Categories

111.content:
Its a bright and sunny day. The coolest of breezes breathed around the old oak trees that spun high into the sky.

You're a trainer walking through these woods, making your way to the next town.

All of the sudden, the area around you begins to undulate in a green light. You turn around in the direction it's coming from to see a small green pokemon flying straight at you. It is two feet high, light and olive green colored with antennae and bright blue eyes. While you gawk at the pokemon speeding toward you, the involuntary muscle reactions necessitating getting-the-fuck-out-of-the-way have yet to kick in.

Leading to a face-full of Celebi.
111.title: Celebi

1111.content:
Nearly 40 minutes later, you wake up very disconcerted. Your face is in a lot of pain. Everything is in darkness and it feels like you have a weight on your face.

A foot moves momentarily out of your eye allowing you to see what was on you. Celebi's laughing face could be seen before her foot came back over you and she trampled your face again.

When you became more aware of your predicament, you started to get up. Celebi, alarmed at her plaything moving, fell into your lap. Before fully sitting upright, Celebi stood up and tried to push you back down. You stop moving up but look questioningly at the time traveling pokemon. She continues to push on your chest with her tiny arms. Celebi looks up at you with a very sad expression and tears begin welling in her eyes. You start to lay back down slowly and her face instantly brightens up. She flys up to your chest when you lie completely down again, and sits down right near your neck.
1111.title: You're unconscious

choices: Celebi: Stick foot in your mouth
11111.content: Celebi wastes no time on formalities as she shoves her soft, smelly feet right into your nose. The tops of her feet curl around your nose. The smell makes you a little bit dizzy. You wonder how a creature who flys around all day could work up any foot sweat. You are seized out of your thoughts as Celebi forces her footflesh on your face with greater intensity. She squishes your face harder and harder as she begins to float up with momentum. Soon she is standing straight up on your face again, while grinding her heel's and toes in the whole time.
11111.title: Celebi: foot smelling

111111.content:
You look up to Celebi with questioning thoughts as she moves her feet from your nose briefly. You try to move you body to sit up for a moment, but the sad and tearing eyes you looked into as her facial expression shows disappointment in your action. You then again lay back down. Her face brightened with joy and she plants one foot on your lip. You are wondering why she's doing this, but then she tries to force her foot into your mouth.

After a few minutes of trying to to keep your mouth shut, you give in and let her place her foot into your mouth. The taste wasn't too bad, but then again, her feet tasted like pure grass so it's hard to say really. She then put her hand in her mouth and beings to suck on her hands as she points at her foot in your mouth. She wants you to...
111111.title: Celebi: Stick foot in your mouth

11112.content:
You stare into the large blue eyes of the Celebi as she gets a more and more provocative look on her face. She reached out a tiny green hand and put it on your lips. You raised an eyebrow in question but she continued to prod.

Bii Bii!!!

She rubbed her soft foot on your face, inching it towards your mouth. It was then that you understood what she wanted. You paused at the idea. The thought of tasting her foot seemed disgusting. Who knows where her feet have been? You try and shake your head but Celebi just wont have it. She starts pounding your lips with both hands and squishing your face between both feet. This Celebi was determined to get what she wanted.
11112.title: Celebi: foot worship

choices: Resist - pretend to be dead and hope she leaves.
111122.content:
Although the Celebi was being quite insistent, you still refuse to place your mouth anywhere near her feet. That would be not just disgusting, but humiliating as well, and you're determined to not give in as well as this pokemon is determined to get what she wants.

"Biii!" she screams, bothered by the fact that her 'toy' isn't willing to do as she is asking.

Then, a malicious sparkle takes place in her eyes, her mouth shifting from an annoyed look to a wide, toothy grin. If this human didn't want to do as she wanted, she just had to force him to.

"Bi!" you hear the Celebi say as she stands up on your body, placing her face near yours, making eye contact with you.

Then, you notice her eyes starting to glow of an azure color. Whatever that means, Celebi's behavior left you not liking it. And yet, for some reason, you couldn't pull off your gaze.

And that was your mistake.

Hypnotized, you don't notice that the two eyes seem to be getting... bigger.

Bigger and bigger, until you could see the green face they belong to. Actually, you could see the body they belong to, which is currently several times bigger than you.
"Bi!" the Celebi's voice snaps you back to reality.

Shaking your head, you look up, finding the pokemon smirking down at you.
"What the..." you couldn't finish your phrase as the now gigantic foot of Celebi comes down on you, pinning you to the ground.

From this size, the smell of grass was several times stronger than before, and it assaults your nose.

You desperately try to not inhale the scent of the Celebi's foot. The situation has gotten far worse than before. She literally turned you into a toy. Her toy. She could do whatever she wanted with you, and you know it.


You're starting to run out of air when the Celebi moves off her foot, giving you a clear visual of her titanic body. She towers above you.

Giving a mischievous smile, she repeats the same moves from before, placing her paw on her mouth, before pointing to her foot.

And, before you could react, she had you pinned in between her foot and the ground again, the smell hitting your nose once again.

You know there is one way out of this, but you really don't want to submit to the grass type. But, even if you somehow manage to escape, what could you do at your current size?

"Bi!" you hear the Celebi cry. She's getting impatient...
111122.title: Celebi: force you

choices: Sprint away - Shrunken or no, you're not going to turn into some fairy's toy.
Walk towards her - getting your size back comes first.
1111221.content:
In desperation, you push your hands against her foot. Hoping to get some of her weight of your chest so you can at least keep breathing throughout her game of footsie. You might as well try to lift a continent.

Your arms slide painfully to your sides.Your ribs groan in protest as your chest is compressed again under her mass, and the bit of air you managed to take in is forced from your lungs as the foot settles on top of you once again.

"Biii..." you hear again from far up high, muffled through the tons of foot-flesh currently covering you. Still, you get the gist of what she's saying: "I'm waiting..."

From what you've heard of the legendary pokemon, she's not the type to kill you on purpose. But you're pretty sure you'll end up an accidental smear if she doesn't ease up on her "encouragement" soon.

Your lungs are burning for air, and darkness is seeping in from the edges of your vision when the foot lifts slightly again, granting you another breath. You greedily fill your lungs with the stale air underneath the pokemons foot, not even caring about the smell anymore. The paw starts lowering again, and you do the only thing you can think of to stop it.

To your surprise, the taste isn't too bad. Sure, your saliva, the crushed grass and gritty sand form a foul mixture in your mouth, but it's simply unpleased, not the disgusting mess you expected it to be. And though it feels weird to lick something warm and moving, the foot itself is pretty much tasteless. Maybe abit salty and earth-like, but nothing that would roil your stomach.

For now it looks like your lapping has stopped the descent of the great fleshy ceiling suspended above you, though you're still smushed uncomfortably between it and the ground. It's not long before you managed to clean the sole within the limits of what your mouth can reach.

It seems Celebi picked up on this problem as she fully removes her foot from your body, destroying most of the progress you made as she sets her foot back on the ground. The green mountain looks much happier after having received your tongue bath, positively beaming down at you.

Suddenly, she turns around, and starts walking away from you. At your small size, you can hear the dirt shift with every step she takes. Getting compressed and pushed aside underneath that unbearable weight, much like you had been earlier. You want to get away from this feet-obsessed fairy as far and fast as you can, but you don't envy your chances of making it out of this forest at your current size. Your best solution for that problem is currently moving away from you with giant strides. Since your green tormentress managed to shrink you, she can probably also reverse it. But you might even prefer facing the forest as you are now, over having to participate in any more of her games.

Your train of thought is interrupted as Celebi makes a small pirouette before plopping her butt down in front of a tree, and props her feet up in your direction. It looks like they are about as tall as you. She probably even used them to determine how far she should shrink you, considering you've not seen her do anything yet that doesn't involve her feet. This new view on the green monoliths also confirms your earlier fears - any progress you made in getting one of them clean has been completely undone by that short stroll of hers. The spin at the end was probably to make completely sure you had to start over, as dirt and grass once again clings to every inch of her feet

"Bi!"

She brings her hand to her lips and points to her feet again, before leaning back against the trunk and looking at you expectantly. It looks like she's eager to have you continue your service, and she intends to enjoy it as much as she can this time around.

Deciding quickly, you...
1111221.title: Give up - lick her foot.

choices: The fairies use their feet to settle this!
11112211.content:
...decide to take a chance,and run for your life and dignity. And this action made the time traveling pokemon screeched in anger and supise.

Until..you're floating off the ground,and in front of the face of...Tapu Lele herself. "Oh dear Acreus.." You muttered in a grim voice,and knowing full well this (very debately evil and cruel) pokemon is capable o. And..the tone your voice seem to spark..something in the fairy's eyes.

"Taplepu.." She said in..annoyed tone,as a bright flash enveloped your vision. And suddenly..your back to..normal size? The female tapu has a smug "Now that's much better" look on her mouthless face. And her...um...shell split opened,and reveal some very humanish legs and four toed feet.

Her big,long,and wide humanish feet were a complete opposite to Celebi's small,dainty,and petite three toed paws. Her feet had a..very strong and fresh cheesy and vingaery odor opposed to Celebi's own stale grassy and earthy aroma.

The Tapu made a pleased face at your reaction to the faintest whiff of her odor. And she made a playful yet..mean giggle as she slowly float her feet to your already abused face until..a shrill "BBBBIIIII!" rained on the tapu's parade.

The forest guardian is glaring at the guardian of abundance with the fury of a mother hydreigon. While tapu lele is defiantly staring at the smaller fairy back with a amused and apathetic look on her face.

You on hand,is slowly inching away from the feud of the two mythical fairies,using this as opportunity to get away. But what happens next?
11112211.title: Another fairy..

choices: ...Tapu lele,you need a damn break from Celebi
111122111.content:
The fairies stopped their little..."discussion",and look at you... with those admittedly adorable eyes. They presented their two vastly different pairs of feet to you. They glance each other competitively,you have a damn good idea of what they want.

"Stockholm syndrome is a real bitch.. " The boy thought as a new feeling bubbled from with in him as he saw the feet in front of him.Damn fairies are giving him a competely {uunwanted kink for goddamn poke-feet.

The fairies is obviously getting impatient. So he quickly picked....
111122111.title: Pick your Poison

choices: Tapu lele wants her turn, and guess what she does first
Celebi starts to cautiously play with.."it"
1111221112.content:
...Celebi, because Tapu Lele is..well nuts.The forest guardian in a show of maturity sticks her tongue at the other guardian as she floats to you. Lele huffed and tilt her head upwards at the smaller Pokemon display.

The little fairy paid her no attention, as she stared at you with thinly veiled hurt and scorn in her watery crystal blue eyes. Your eyes widen at the fact that your little act of defiance has hurt Celebi that badly.

But before you get to say anything, Celebi rams her two little feet to your face, and surprisedly force you down to the ground. You became inflamed as you felt her little toes roughly pinching your cheeks. And her soft soles repeatedly slapping your poor forehead. Lele looked at the scene with a weird combination of fascination and indignation.

The obviously scorned fairy momentarily stops her assault as she angrily grips your nose with her left toes. The strong and familiar scent of dirty grass and stale vinegar fills in your lungs and making you quite woozy. The fairy brought her right foot over your lips and slowly began to grind on it.

Celebi gains a vindictive smirk and lets out some gleeful giggles. The tapu gives the smaller pokemon an impressed look. But both Pokemon so happen to look down and saw the unwarranted "tent" in your pants.

Your face paled in utter horror and embarrassment as you felt the Lele slowly unzipped your pants, and reveal your painful as hell erection that is still being covered by underwear. Both Pokemon became shockingly flustered and unsure at the sight of your throbbing "appendage". Yet you can you plainly see the childlike curiosity in their eyes.

'Nononononono...' You frantically thought at a absolutely maddening pace as you pray for a miracle to save you from this nightmare. But sadly,you're out of luck.

What happens next?
1111221112.title: Sucks to be you right now.

choices: Celebi wants you to worship her feet...
Celebi wants to stomp on you...
11112212.content:
Gulping down the remains of the disgusting mixture from Celebi's foot, you start walking towards her, knowing that running is pretty much pointless - even the weakest of her psychic powers would stop you in no time. That aside, you would never be able to face the forest - if you somehow managed to escape Celebi - and its dangers at this size. So, even though very reluctantly, you decide to do as the pokemon wants in order to regain your original stature.

Seeing you approach her foot, Celebi gives a smile.
"Bi!" the green fairy exclaims happily as you stop in front of her foot.
"Bi!" she repeats impatiently. Somehow, you make out the meaning of her words, ‘Get started!’.

And so, taking a few, deep breaths, you once again push your tongue into the dirty sole.

Immediately, the unpleasant sensation returns in your mouth as you lick off the nasty mix of the disgusting things stuck to Celebi's foot.

The monolithic grass type moans in pure bliss as you give her foot yet another tongue bath. Sure, the whole thing is humiliating as it is weird - being reduced to the size of a bug and forced to lick the sole of a pokemon clean - but, at least, you aren't being pinned in between the foot and the ground like you had been earlier. Nonetheless, the smell of grass is still present, and it is most certainly not getting any better. Your only hope is that the legendary would return you to normal once you finished your task.

Suddenly, a fear crosses your mind. What if Celebi plans to keep you as shrunken as her toy for the rest of your days? You shiver at the thought. How did you even managed to get into this situation?


It takes you a bit, but you finally manage to lick the sole clean. Apparently, Celebi noticed it.
"Bi." comes her booming cry, motioning for you to start with her other foot, which is as dirty - if not more - as the other was before being 'polished'.


Slowly, you move towards the other green 'tower'. You hesitate for a moment.
"Biiii!" Celebi cries immediately, catching your hesitation. She wants you to finish off your task, no matter what.

So, breathing in deeply again, you start licking her second paw, sending the nasty time traveler into moaning blissfully once again, as you experience for the third time the strong smell assaulting your nose, while disgust takes over your mouth, threatening to make you faint. Your very being won't bear this situation for much longer. It's simply becoming too much for you to go on...


After almost half and an hour, you finally take one last lick, before stopping, having cleaned Celebi's foot completely.

Struggling to not throw up, you get away from the pokemon's feet.
"Bi!" Celebi says in a cheerful tone. You can tell she's satisfied with your work.

Managing to dominate yourself a bit, you look up at the giantess.
"Please... I've done what you wanted... return me to normal..." you mutter in a pleading tone.

But she just giggles, before you feel yourself being dragged closer to her feet once again. You understand two things: one, she's using her psychic powers to incapacitate you; two... she isn't done with you just yet...

As she drops you at her feet again, she looks down at you with the same smirk she had earlier. You quickly understand what she's up to...
11112212.title: Walk towards her - getting your size back comes...

choices: She's pleased with your rub and grows you back to your previous shrunken size.
She looks a bit confused and gently wags her other foot at you. You forgot one!
111122121.content:
As she looks down at you expectantly, you know by the mischievous glint in her eye that any attempt to protest her wishes would not end well for you.

"A-Alright. I'll play with your feet some more." You nervously assure her, before wishfully adding: "But you'll grow me back afterwards... Right?"

You immediately regret saying the last bit, as you see that otherworldly glow return to her eyes. Fearing the no doubt unspeakable foot-related torture she has in mind for you, you quickly brace yourself and await the psychic assault.

...

Something should have definitely happened by now. The lack of any psychic action starts to disturb you more and more as your mind wages a battle between protecting yourself from the inevitable onslaught, and curiosity to find out what's taking so long. When you finally manage to gather enough courage to look at her face again, you just see her close her eyes as she offers you a half-hearted shrug.

"Bi."

You breathe a sigh of relief at the discovery that no new abuse of your body at her feet seems to be coming, and accept that this dismissive commitment of hers is the best you're going to get. You quickly and dutifully make your way to her foot again, before she reconsiders pulling any more supernatural shenanigans on you. When you arrive, you realize the sole looms above you slightly, obviously bigger than before. Not a whole lot, but still easily noticeable. Did that time-traveling fiend shrink you again!?

Since there's little you can do about it now, you decide to set to the task at hand. You're unsure on how to even start rubbing a foot taller than you. To begin, you try placing your hands at the sides of it and gently start kneading, slowly moving them up and down along its edges as you do. You even find yourself getting slightly into it. This is much more pleasant for you as well after all, compared to the experience of having to lick it or getting stepped on.

Sadly, your spell is soon broken when you hear her sigh in disappointment. You chance a look upwards and see her staring back at you with a bored expression. Her head rests in one paw as she lazily observes your pitiful attempt to make good on your promise. The message is clear. If you don't come up with something better soon, there's no chance she's ever restoring your size.

You frantically move your hands around the edge of her foot, squeezing as you go, but her expression doesn't change. You bring your hands to the wider surface of her sole and slide them around like that, but all you accomplish is coaxing an exaggerated yawn from her. It's like she can barely even feel you.

Running out of ideas, you punch her foot in frustration. And then immediately regret doing so. You slowly peek upwards, to see if she noticed. She obviously did. But, astonishingly, she doesn't seem angry. Nor does she look like she's about to fall asleep. She just looks down at you surprised.

You decide to try again, and jam your knee into her arch. This gets her to sit upright again. Looks like you've not wasted your chance! You start outright pummeling the great foot. You shoulder bash the ball of her foot and hammer against it with your fist. You kick and punch the arch. You try out bear hugs and full body tackles against her towering sole. With every blow, you try your utmost to push as deep into the scented flesh as you can. It's absolutely exhausting, but the pleased mutterings pouring from her lips tell you you're doing something right.

You keep going as long as you can before softly leaning against her skin, trying to catch your breath. Every inhale fills your lungs with the scent of her foot. Your muscles ache and your body is damp with sweat. Yours or hers, you honestly can't tell at this point. Nor can you bring yourself to really care.

You just hope it was enough.
111122121.title: Celebi wants you to worship her feet...

choices: ... she's satisfied with your work - she grows you up... a little...
... she's still unsatisfied - seems you're staying this size for a while...
1111221212.content:
Trying to regain your breath, you look up at the time traveler, hope filling your eyes.
"Please... would you be so kind to return me to normal now...?" you carefully choose your words, hoping that Celebi would take pity on you and that she would undo the shrinking.

But, against your hopes, the pokemon cocks her head, eyeing you with that expectant look you now got used to. And, soon enough, you feel something tapping you.

You turn your head to see her other foot gently, yet repeatedly, poking your small being in an impatient manner.

It doesn't take long for you to realize the meaning of her action. If she had you worship one of her feet, she obviously wants you to completely get over with your task.
"You want me to play with your other foot as well?" you inquire.

You notice Celebi slowly moving her head up and down, nodding.
"And... will you return me to my size after I'm done?" you ask hopefully.

Once again, Celebi cocks her head. Now, you expect her eyes to start glowing again, shrinking you further than this, like you did earlier.

But it never happens; instead, the time traveler gives a small smirk.
"Bi..." she says mischievously. Once again, you manage to catch the meaning of her words: "Maybe...".

Sighing, you make your way to her other foot.

And, stopping in front of it, you start hitting it as you did with the other; your elbow collides with her heel, and so does your knee; you punch the sides of her paw, headbutt the sole, you even try using double kicks, everything that might satisfy her. But Celebi stays silent during the whole process.

At least, until...

"Biiii...." you stop to gaze up to the giantess, realising that she just yawned out of boredom.

Once again, she looks dejected, her gaze fixed on the ground, telling you that she's paying little to no attention to your actions. Clearly, she once again wants you to come up with something else.

"As you wish..." you mutter, starting to back away from her foot.

Celebi shifts her gaze to you, curious about your next action.

Once you feel you've gotten far enough, you stop and look at Celebi, spotting the amused amused expression on her face.

Mentally counting to three, you start sprinting towards her at your full speed.

And, at short distance from her foot, you leap up and extend your leg, thrusting your own foot deep into hers.

"Bi!"

Upon landing, you look at Celebi, eager to see her reaction.

You notice that a wide-open-mouth smile had brightened up her face, while her paws collide together repeatedly. She's clapping her paws.

Clearly, she appreciated that.

"Did you like that?" the legendary nods with excitement.
"You want me to do it again?" again, the up-down movements of her head answer your question.
"Alright."


And so, you start doing it over and over, hitting her foot with flying kicks until your breath is cut short, to the point you have to stop in order to catch it.

Yet again, you lean against Celebi's foot, and your lungs experience being filled with grass-scented air as you keep inhaling and exhaling, trying to regain your breath.

You don't even care about the scent anymore, having now spent hours with the grass type's feet.

"Bi! Bi!" Celebi exclaims cheerfully as you rest.

You breath in the scented air emanated from her foot for about five minutes, in which point the surface you're leaning against moves forward, poking you.

Looking up to the giantess, you notice her staring right back at you, a now familiar, expectant look on her face.

Gathering all of your courage, you slowly gaze into her bright blue eyes, deciding to speak with soft words:
"Please. I did play with you, now return me to my original size. I beg you." you can tell that Celebi heard your request for sure.

And, from the look she gives you after you spoke, you get that...
1111221212.title: She looks a bit confused and gently wags her ot...

choices: Better safe than sorry - you eat as much as you can however she gives it to you
You clean the first foot, then try to convince her to join you for the rest
11112212121.content:
It takes a while for your request to fully sink in. Then, you can see her visibly struggle to come up with a proper response for your repeated plea. She obviously doesn't want to lose her new toy yet, but she also appreciates how you willingly went along with her games despite the rocky start, and wants to reward you for that in some way.

The conclusion to her dilemma announces itself by an exasperated sigh escaping from her lips, and she starts to focus her psychic abilities again. You feel a strange power encompassing you, coaxing your body to swell and grow. Her dainty feet start to lose their intimidating size as the first milestone - her knees - slowly inch towards eye level. It's not long before your growth leaves those behind too, as you expand further towards her waist. Then her shoulders. Then even further beyond.

She's doing it! She's really doing it! You started to doubt she ever would, but she's actually growing you back!

You see the supernatural glow disappear from your eyes when you can look directly into them without having to crane your neck upwards, and your growth spurt fizzles to a stop. She confirms that this is the new size she's decided to give you with a happy "Bi".

You just stand there unmoving for a while, looking deep into the fairy's eyes for any sign of trickery. It doesn't take long before you're unable to hold back your emotions.

"THANK YOU CELEBI!!" You cry out loudly.

Sure, standing eye to eye with the fairy is still a long way from regaining your original size, but after being forced to look at the world through a bug's eye view, getting stepped on, getting toyed with, feeling like the smallest twitch from her could erase you from existence...Every inch gained is precious to you. And the increase in your size also brings back new hope. That she regards you as more than just a toy to use and abuse however she sees fit, that she might actually fully restore you. That you might just walk out of here in one piece.

You quickly grab her into a tight and heartfelt hug to thank her. Celebi, clearly not expecting the physical assault, sends you flying back with a powerful psychic blow. Only after you've painfully landed – first slamming against a tree before falling to the ground - does she realize that you weren't trying to hurt her, and a slight blush creeps to her cheeks in embarrassment as she regards your crumpled form.

Laying flat on your back like this, you can see the sun is starting to set, your view of the sky this time unobstructed by any giant Celebi pads. Damn. You'd have hoped to at least come within seeing distance of the next town by the end of the day. Your experience with Celebi had made you lose complete track of time. You need to set up camp soon, before you lose the sunlight completely. You can also feel your stomach start to nag at you, demanding a proper meal after being forced to process the fairy's foot funk.

You start walking towards where your backpack fell by the roadside. You don't fancy your chances to get the tent set up at your current size, but hope your sleeping bag will at least offer some protection from the night's chill.

Celebi looks alarmed as she sees you walk past her and quickly flutters in front of you, spreading out her arms in an effort to stop you.

"Don't worry Celebi, I'm just getting some things from my bag. I'm not going anywhere". You assure her.

The fairy reluctantly lets you pass, but you can feel she's keeping a close eye on you. You don't doubt that should you try anything funny, she'll put you right back under her foot.

You halt in front of your backpack. You don't remember taking it off. You must've dropped it during your collision with Celebi. Or she removed it when you were out cold, thinking it'd get in the way during her playtime.

Whatever the case, it's still completely normal-sized, leaving it slightly taller than you. Your sleeping bag sits on top of it, rolled up tight and tied firmly to the rest of your pack. You quickly untie the bag from your pack, having to put in much more effort due to your smaller size, and gravity quickly pulls it down to the ground. It rolls away from you slightly, coming to a stop between you and the grass pokemon watching you with curiosity. You quickly dive in your pack and return with your prize: a small pot, two packs of instant soup, a bottle of water and some matches. You manage to drag them all over towards Celebi with some difficulty, feeling quite proud of yourself.

"Bi?" she asks, unsure what to make of your collection of items.

"It's dinner" You confidently reply. "Not the best admittedly, but it'll do"

She looks unconvinced, and starts gently chewing on a corner of one of your soup packs. You can barely choke back a laugh.

"We still need to prepare it before we can eat." You try to explain as she spits out the plastic. "But I want to get the sleeping bag unrolled first. Come on, give me a hand".

Celebi's unsure if she likes having you boss her around like this. She decides to let it slide since you brought out so many exciting new things for her to play with. Besides, she can always easily put you back in your place if you try to take it too far.

And so you begin your preparations for the evening, with the legendary pokemon following shortly after. You manage to prepare the sleeping bag, having to unroll it by pushing it around like a hay bale. You also gather some firewood and stones to perch your pot on, and filled it with water. Celebi even seems impressed as she sees you strike a match to light your small campfire. You dump in your powdered soup and start stirring it around, Taking small breaks to check on the fire, to make sure it doesn't peter out.

Unfortunately, it doesn't take long for the fairy to get bored again. While you're busy feeding the flames some more wood, you hear a loud splash. When you look back up to investigate you find her casually lowering her left foot into your dinner, it's right counterpart already submerged in the thick liquid. She seems to enjoy her improvised foot bath, happily gliding both feet through the hot soup and gently kicking at the floating pieces of vegetable.

"Come on Celebi, we're supposed to eat that!"

She innocently giggles at your frustration, and playfully raises one of her feet out of the soup and offers it to you. She calmly waves it in front of your face, trying to encourage you to dig in. You watch as thin rivers of soup gently flow down her arch, following the wrinkles and folds of her sole, before converging on her heel and softly dripping back into the pot. The rich scent of the liquid gets your mouth watering even though the other, less appetizing, but by now very familiar smell of the grass type's feet is also clearly present in the aroma now tickling your nose. Your stomach loudly approves the vicinity of something edible, and you start to lean slowly towards the offering without even realizing.

Celebi seems to be have fun causing your visible discomfort, and decides to pile it on even more. She slowly and exaggeratedly opens her own mouth as she lets her foot approach your face, like she's trying to coax a baby into eating its porridge.

"Biiiii..."

It connects and, feeling her foot softly prod against your lips, you hesitantly lick up the traces of soup it leaves behind. Do you even risk your new size by protesting Celebi's wishes? The empty pit in your stomach does its best to convince you to stop caring. You probably shouldn't even try to get out of lapping your first serving off her sole like she wants. But, after showing your willingness to keep playing along with her even at your larger size, maybe you'll be able to convince her to drop the foot stuff. For today at least. She must be hungry as well, and she can't really eat any of the soup while she's bathing in it. Maybe you can get her to stop relaxing her feet in the dinner you prepared by inviting her to eat it together with you?
11112212121.title: ... she's satisfied with your work - she gr...

choices: ... her eyes start to glow - she's shrinking you again!
... she shrugs and curls up beside you.
111122121212.content:
Deciding to do as Celebi wants for a bit, you start licking the soup off her foot.

"Bi!" the legendary gives out a pleased sigh. She's clearly enjoying this - as she enjoyed every other 'game' she put you through - but you decide that you have to convince her to stop, for the night at least. Your stomach is getting noisier as it claims its daily meal.

So, you keep licking the grass type's foot for about five minutes, before stopping, having cleaned it up.


"Bi!" she exclaims with a giggle, raising her other foot from the soup. As expected, drops of the liquid fall off her foot, splashing right back down into the pot.

Shaking your head, you look at Celebi.

You carefully choose your words, in order to avoid being shrunk again. Being Celebi's playmate is far better than being her toy, and you intend keeping the situation like this.

"Look, Celebi, I'm getting really hungry. And tired. Why don't we just take a break? Just for tonight?" you suggest.
"Bi?" the grass type asks, lowering her foot.

You go on.
"Yeah, why don't we stop for a while, so we can eat our (my) dinner? I mean, I did play with you all day, right?...Aren't you hungry too?" you ask, noticing her dejected look.

A sudden growl of her stomach answers your question. She looks at you with a bit of a blush on her face.
"Bi." she says with a nod. You smile. You did it, she's willing to take a break from her 'games'!

"Ehm... could you stop... 'bathing', so we can eat?" you ask again.

Once again, Celebi is hesitant. The sensation of the warm liquid is pleasing her feet very much. But she also would like to eat something right now. And again, you willingly played with her.

So, she decides, she can take a break... for a bit.

Slowly, she floats upwards, removing her feet from the soup. Its aroma tickles your nose, it makes your mouth water, it makes your stomach growl in hunger once again.

And so, you hastily get to your bag, digging into it, just to emerge from it with a spoon. Even though the soup was used for a foot bath, you still intend to eat it.

And, apparently, Celebi does as well. Turning around, you find the fairy dunking her whole face into the pot, hungrily sipping your well desired meal.
"Come on Celebi, I want to eat that as well!" you call out for the fairy.

In response, she lifts her head from the pot, soup dripping from her face.
"Bi!" she cries happily, obviously liking it. You sigh, walking toward her.

It takes you a bit to convince the fairy to let you eat as well, but you can finally take a spoonful of soup. Your stomach growls in hunger once again as you can finally sip the warm liquid.

It doesn't take long before the pot is emptied from all the soup.
"Bi!" Celebi cries again, licking her lips.
"You did like it, I guess..." you remark, taking a small sip of water from your bottle.

The grass type nods at you with a beaming smile. You laugh.


Eventually, you give a yawn, meaning that you're stuffed, ready to call it a day.


Suddenly, you notice something touching you. Turning your head, you see Celebi poking you with a paw. Seeing that she has your attention, she gives a smile and points to her feet again. She's clearly eager to resume her fun.

"Come on Celebi, can't we play tomorrow?" you ask pleadingly, hiding an annoyed tone.
"Biiiiii..." she whines.
"Please... I'm very tired, I want to sleep..." you say.


Now, you expect her eyes to glow azure once again, shrinking you down again, just to be successively put under her foot once again. The seconds of tension that precede the time traveler's answer feel like an oppressive weight on your heart.

But, contraire to what you expected, the grass type just sighs.
"Bi." she says, giving you a nod.

You smile at her.
"Thank you, Celebi." you say, leaning to grab her in a hug. At least, she doesn't send you flying with her psychic powers this time.


Slowly, you break the hug and walk towards your sleeping bag. Yet again, Celebi keeps a close eye on you. Not that you have any intention to leave anyway. You have to regain your size first. And something tells you that it'll take some time for that to happen.


Yawning again, you reach your unrolled sleeping bag and slip into it. Because of your new size, it's much bigger, and you have no problems in sliding inside completely.

You curl up, getting ready to sleep. Until...

"Bi!" you hear Celebi's alarmed cry. And, before you can process what happened, you feel something hitting the sleeping bag from the outside.

You peek out, finding the grass type pounding it. She must think of your sleeping bag as some monster that swallowed you.

"Celebi!" you call out.

The agitated legendary stops for a moment, turning her head to you. And, upon seeing your head sticking from the bag, she quickly floats over you.

You notice her eyes glowing blue as she tries to pull you out with psychic.
"Celebi, calm down! It's just a sleeping bag, I need it to sleep!" you exclaim.

The grass type seems to calm down upon hearing your words. Though she still looks reluctant.

Slowly, she pokes the sleeping bag with a paw, only to immediately retract it.
"Bi?" she says, poking it again, repeatedly, before deciding it's harmless.

Sighing, you crawl right back inside, curling up once again. But you're once again disturbed as you feel the sleeping bag moving.

Opening your eyes, you notice Celebi trying to get inside as well.
"Celebi? What are you doing?" you ask, more tired than curious about her action.

In response to your question, she points to you.
"You want to sleep in my sleeping bag?" you ask, starting to blush. She manages to get fully inside and nods. Your size, along with hers, is enough to occupy the bag completely.
"But... you know, it was made for one..." you say.


Celebi looks at you for a moment, processing what you said, before giving a smile. Though it is true that you've known her for just today, you already learned that the smile that is currently adorning her face can't mean anything good...

And you soon discover what she has in mind as...
111122121212.title: You clean the first foot, then try to convince ...

choices: A pair of your socks, and you look small enough to fit completely inside one.
The VERY FRAGILE package you're supposed to deliver.
1111221212121.content:
You realize what's coming when you see her eyes shimmer with power again. Desperate to avoid another loss in size, you try to struggle out of the sleeping bag. Frantically attempting to get away from the psychic pokemon. Unfortunately the bag fits pretty snugly around the two of you at your current size, and you accomplish little beside some futile wiggling.

You do eventually manage to get free, and quickly stumble to your feet to start running. Three steps is all you manage before your escape is cut short by the fingers of a now gigantic paw wrapping around your torso. Your feet lift off the ground with a gentle tug, and you find yourself being slowly pulled closer back to your now giant bedroll.

You fearfully look back at the now giant cloth cavern. You know what's hiding in the darkness beyond its opening. She must be planning to stuff you inside, to give her feet some company during the night. Give them a toy to idly play with while she's free to dream up new ways of tormenting you the next day.

"Please... No, Celebi. You can have the sleeping bag, I'll go find some soft patch of dirt to sleep on. Please just let me go."

You weakly squirm in her grip, trying your best to get loose. Both your pleas and your struggling are for naught and you get carried past the entrance of the padded tunnel. The light pouring in allows you to watch your dreaded nemeses fidgeting further below, eagerly awaiting your arrival. The warm air bellowing upwards from the depths of the padded sack greets you with their natural scent.

To your surprise however, your descent is halted before you come even close to reaching them. Your back presses firmly into a soft, warm wall and the fingers keeping you captive relax, though still cover most of your body. You experimentally push against them. You find you can lift them away, with some difficulty, making it clear she's not trying to resist your efforts to free yourself. Your efforts do coax a confused "Bi?" from your captor. Looking upwards, you see she's lifted the padded ceiling and regards you questioningly. Obviously trying to figure out what you were attempting. Feeling safer with the threat of nightly foot fun no longer looming over you, you hesitantly assure her: "Oh err... Nothing. I thought umm.. You startled me is all."

Seemingly content with the explanation, she offers a reassuring smile and lowers her other hand back onto her chest, slowly guiding the cloth blanket back onto you. You slowly sigh to yourself. You guess you don't mind playing her teddy bear for the night, but you wish she'd at least given you some warning before shrinking you again.

The giant fairy actually makes a comfortable bed, you find. The softness and warmth of her body are surprisingly cozy, and the beat of her heart might as well be a sweet lullaby that slowly carries you off to sleep.

...

You groggily wake up, before shooting wide awake with a panic. Everything is huge! You start struggling to get out of the oppressive cave your bedroll has become, before you remember the events of the day before and calm down again.

Though, you don't see the jolly green giantess anymore. She couldn't have left you like this, could she? Panic starts to return when an odd sound catches your attention. A soft, oddly familiar sounding, muffled humming, punctuated by many other sounds you don't immediately recognize.

You decide to carefully make your way to source of the noise, and find the titanic grass type rooting through the rest of your bag. It looks like she shrunk it too, allowing her easier access, and has buried herself inside from the waist up. Periodically, you watch something fly out, evidently having failed to catch her attention for more than a few seconds. The ground is littered with pots, pants, cups, snacks, papers...

"Celebi" You try, hoping to stop her from burrowing through your stuff any longer.

You're too late to dodge a shirt heading straight towards you. Any complaints you try to make quickly get silenced underneath the oversized cloth. It takes a while before you manage to walk out of one of the sleeves towards freedom, just in time to see your camera sail through the air and, luckily, find a safe landing on top of the sleeping bag you occupied a couple of minutes ago.

"CELEBI!" You shout at the top of your lungs this time, not wanting to take any more chances with the rest of your more sensitive belongings.

This time you've managed to catch her attention and she slowly emerges from the depths of your bag. Her eyes quickly find your shrunken form on the ground, and she happily makes her way over to you. You see her pull one last item from your backpack, absentmindedly carrying it along for the short trip towards you. Only when her towering form comes to a halt in front of you, do you get a good look at what she's brought over.

You go white as a sheet as you realize it's...
1111221212121.title: ... her eyes start to glow - she's shrinkin...

choices: ... walk around with you stuck in the sock...
... have you lick her foot... again...
11112212121211.content:
As soon as your gaze fixes on what Celebi is holding, you go pale as death itself. Or, in this case, as the twin objects Celebi is holding: a pair of your socks. They're roughly twice your size, but still, you're just the perfect size to slide into one completely.

Even with you inside, there would still be plenty of room...

"Celebi..." you mutter in a scared whisper as you find her large, green arm reaching down to get a hold of you.

Soon, those three fingers that comforted you through the night wrap around your torso, squeezing the air out of your lungs as she lifts you off the ground, bringing your helpless body upwards.

You are easily lifted past her knees, belly, chest and in the end you reach her face.
"Bi!Bi!" she says excitedly. Most probably, she's eager to start playing again.

Your theory is confirmed as you see her other paw, the one holding the socks, inching closer to you.
"Bi?" the legendary asks you. Somehow, you understand the meaning of her words, ‘Ready to play?’.

You look up, noticing the giantess staring right back at you, that familiar smirk of hers present on her face. That can't mean anything good for you.

"Celebi... please... I just woke up..." you try to dissuade the giantess from starting playing. Your brain refuses to imagine yourself being trapped in between her scented foot and the fabric. That would be the worst situation you get in since you met Celebi.

But the mischievous legendary just closes her eyes, and shrugs, before moving you to the entrance of your sock.

Getting that she won't need both, she the other one, before giving you a mischievous grin.
"Biiii~" she sings.

You give her one last, pleading look.
"Ce-" before you can talk, she drops you into the white tunnel. In a matter of seconds, you land to the bottom of it.

Luckily, you had washed it before leaving, so there is pretty much no smell... yet.

And you can't do nothing but watch as the titanic grass type abruptly sits down, and moves the sock closer to her foot, the characteristic smell of grass you got used to taking place inside the sock.

Soon, you find your feared enemy sliding its way into the sock. Even though Celebi never used one, she seems to know how to put it on.

And it doesn't take long for her foot to reach the bottom - and you.

Her paw slides right into you, pinning you in between itself and the plush surface of the sock.
"Bi!" comes the muffled, happy cry of the giantess.

Having fulfilled her first objective, Celebi stands back up. Now her foot is onto you. You squirm weakly, making the legendary giggle.

She remains still for a couple of minutes, deciding how to start. But finally gives a smile as she decides to...
11112212121211.title: A pair of your socks, and you look small enough...

choices: She's encountered another pokemon, and is eager to show off with her new toy!
111122121212111.content:
You're not quite sure what's going to happen, but you're pretty sure it can't be good. Celebi's done nothing much besides just stand on you so far and, while the weight of the time traveling pokemon does force you deep into the thick fabric of your sock, your new fuzzy home provides enough padding to make this bearable.

This changes as you suddenly find your world lurching upwards, before heavily crashing back down to the ground. When crash back onto the ground, the oppressive mass onto of you doesn't seem to stop. Instead, it presses further into you, untill you can feel the solid earth through the thick fabric behind you. The sole in front seems to mold over your trapped form. Your body groans as the air is forced out of your lungs. You try to scream at Celebi that this is too much, that she's hurting you, but your mouth is invaded by her foot flesh the second you open it. Any protest is smothered to a whisper before it even leaves you.

Then, just as you thought you were going to pop, the weight leaves you again. It returns shortly after as Celebi takes another step. And then another. This repeats again and again. Every step brings you to the brink of passing out before relenting. You try to squirm to the side of the sole, somewhere you hope to find some shelter from this torment, but the sock is pulled to tight to make any progress. You're utterly at her mercy, forced to bend even your breathing to the rhythm of her casual walk. The foot rises – you breathe in as deep as you can, even though it means filling your lungs with the scent of her feet. The foot falls – you exhale, and silently brace for impact. The foot lands – you grit your teeth and bear through it, ignoring the feeling of having the sweat and dirt of her soles rub off against you. Trying to remain conscious. Rinse and repeat.

And then, Celebi decides to spice things up a bit. Balancing on the ball of her socked foot, she giddily twirls before walking on. You're honestly baffled you didn't get smeared right then and there. Your diminished size must have made you more sturdy than normal. Still, that spin of hers completely destroyed the last of the feeble resistance you managed to put up. Your battered and bruised body now just lies limply against the bottom of the sock, as the sole of her foot continues slamming into you.

She must look so innocent, you sourly realize. Wearing a single sock, happily dancing and twirling through the forest. Nobody would even dare to imagine the torment she's putting you through.

You don't know how long you've been trapped in there. You probably passed out a couple of times during the ordeal. Still, to your great relief, she eventually slows down her little dance. You almost cry in happiness as you hear her sit down, followed by the welcome sound of her fidgeting with the thick cloth of your sock. She's getting you out!

However, you also quickly discover:
111122121212111.title: ... walk around with you stuck in the sock...

choices: She agrees, and grows you back up a little... again.
She disagrees. She isn't done playing just yet.
1111221212121111.content:
Slowly, the time traveler removes the sock from her foot, almost as if voluntarily taking as much time as possible to perform the task.

Still trapped in the white, plush tunnel of the sock, you choke back a sigh of relief, not daring to exhale that little bit of air that you somehow managed to collect in your lungs.

Your body is beaten, covered in bruises, and several of your less important bones are surely broken. You're also pretty sure that your nose is bleeding.

Now you really expected her foot exiting the sock, finally letting you breath. But, weirdly, you seem to be moving forward as well. Even though you can't see past the sole of Celebi's foot, you can definitively feel like you're being dragged along with her foot.

With horror, you realize what's going on: you're stuck to her foot!

You squirm, trying to get free, suddenly not bearing the scent of her paw anymore.

Obviously, you have no success as the foot fully drags you out of the sock.

Celebi brings the sock to her paw, gently shaking it to get you out, unaware of your current situation.

Her smile is replaced by a perplexed look as she finds that you're not coming out like she was expecting. Did her toy somehow get out?

She brings the sock to her eye and peeks into the white tunnel.

Nothing.

"Bi?" she asks herself, suddenly standing up. You cry out in pain.

Luckily, Celebi seems to hear your cry. She sits back down, throws the sock away and slowly looks under her foot, discovering you flattened against it.

She brings her paws to her mouth in a useless attempt to keep herself from bursting into laughter.
"Bi!Bi!Bi!" she laughs merrily, only irritating you further.

After a few minutes she stops laughing, and brings her paw to her foot.

Getting a hold of you, she literally peels you off, and brings you up. Your lungs finally fill with fresh air.

"Bi!" you hear Celebi exclaim. If you could see yourself, you would have understood the reason of that gasp.

Celebi regards your pitiful body, which is bruised and scratched in several points. Plus, you discover, you were right. Your nose is bleeding.

She suddenly feels sorry. She was just having some fun, she didn't wish you any harm.

You cough, groan and look upwards, into the giantess' eyes.
"Happy... now?" you say with a hint of defiance in your voice.

You see the grass type slowly moving her paw downwards, carefully and gently deposing you on the grassy floor. Then, she stands up.

You lay still, and close your eyes, expecting her to rise her foot, only to slam it on you one last time, leaving a red stain on the ground.

But it never happens.

Instead, you feel something gently sliding on your chest. You open your eyes a little, discover Celebi with her paw on you.
"Biiii." she says, focusing.

A whitish green light suddenly surrounds your small form. It actually feels... nice. Like your pain is being relieved.

You slowly rise your head, and watch as the bruises disappear from your body. Your nose stops bleeding. Celebi is healing you!

The thing goes on for a few minutes, before Celebi removes her paw from you.

Before you can act, she gently picks you, and sits back down, while closing you in a hug.

The sudden display of affection makes you blush.
"Bi." you hear her say. You interpret it as an apology.
"It's alright... just don't do that no more." you say.

The grass type smiles down at you. Gently, she releases you. Holding you in a paw, she suddenly floats in midair and flies back where your unrolled sleeping bag and your backpack are.

Ignoring the objects on it, Celebi sits down on your sleeping bag, and gently releases you on it.
"Uh, thanks... I guess." you say. Celebi smiles.

You continue:
"Can I... you know... could you grow me back up? Please?" you literally beg her, not wanting to stay this size a second longer.

Celebi seems to ponder a decision for a moment, before smiling down at you. And, judging by that smile, you understand that...
1111221212121111.title: You're stuck to her foot!

choices: Celebi wants you to kiss her feet...
Celebi wants you to rub her feet...
11112212121211112.content:
You watch as the green giantess sitting in front of you giggles, closes one eye and points a finger upwards, gently wagging it.

The message is pretty much clear, ‘No deal’. You inhale deeply, before letting out an annoyed sigh. Hadn't you enough torture for today? Looking at the circumstances, no.

As if reading your mind, Celebi inches backwards slightly, and rises her feet up in your direction.

You find one of them clean, having been in a sock - along with you.

But the other - you pale just seeing it: it's completely covered in dirt and grime, much like it had been yesterday. And what did she 'ask' you to do back then?

You gulp down. Somehow, the taste of the her scented foot comes back in your mouth as you do so.

You look up at the verdant giantess, finding that expectant look, which you learned to fear, painted on her face as she regards your tiny form by her feet.

"Biii~ii!" she chirps.

Much like to your predictions, she brings her paw to her mouth and then points to her foot.
"No... not again... please..." you mutter under your breath, slightly backing away from the foot. You keep your gaze fixed on Celebi's face, refusing to even look at her foot.

But as you take the amount of three steps, you notice her smirk widening and her eyes glowing as you're pulled right back by her feet by a psychic grasp.

"Bi!" she repeats impatiently.
"C-can't we do something else?" you try, wanting to avoid the disgusting task that awaits.

In response, she rises her three-fingered paw in the air.

Soon, to notice one finger lowering. Then another. Celebi looks at you, one finger still up. She shakes it slightly. This sounds pretty much like a ‘Hurry up. Or else’.

Before she can lower her third finger, you cry out in frustration, and walk towards her dirty foot.
"Bi." the giantess giggles.

You tremble lightly as you stick out your tongue. Reluctantly - very, very reluctantly - you push your tongue on the green surface of her foot, starting to lick it clean once again.

The giant fairy lets out a pleased sigh a she feels your tongue making contact with the surface of her scented foot. She literally loves having you service her feet. It makes her feel... powerful. She could end your existence in a single movement of her foot, and she knows it. She can do whatever she wants with you.

Of course, she won't miss rewarding you for being an obedient toy later on. But for the time being, the only thing she's going to do is sit down, relax and have as much fun as possible.


After about half an hour, you pull yourself back, having finished with your task.

You hold your own mouth, attempting to not throw up what you just swallowed.
"Bi." comes from above. You notice the grass type moving her head to look right under her foot, which regained its original green color.

Celebi's gaze then fixes on you, a smile appearing on her face. You can tell she is satisfied with your work.
"Are... you... happy?" you pant, disgusted at the taste of her foot, that is still very present in your mouth.

She happily nods, answering your question. Then, as you are about to try and get her to grow you back up again, you notice her looking upwards, seeming to be thinking about something.

About what to do next.

A moment full of tension follows as the grass type thinks of successive game.

You don't have to wait for too long, though, as she looks down at you again, that smirk of hers once again taking place on her face...
11112212121211112.title: The foot fun is far from finished.

choices: Take the risk, and carefully make your way past her.
Stay put, and freely let her feet play you until she wakes up.
1111221212122.content:
A casual shrug, before closing her eyes and plopping down into the padded cloth, is the only response you get. The concept of personal space must be foreign to pokemon...

She inches slightly closer to you, trying to find a more comfortable position. She looks remarkably innocent like this. Slightly cute even, with her eyes gently closed and her mouth slightly hanging open, a small drop of drool collecting in the corner of her mouth as she slowly drifts off to sleep. A far cry from the towering giant able to crush you with a single step you saw her as earlier.

You slowly relax as well. As tempting as it is to enjoy this quiet time as long as you can, you're certain you'll need the sleep for whatever she's got planned tomorrow.

...

Consciousness slowly returns to your sleeping form, and you bury your face deeper into your pillow. Not willing to leave the comfortable embrace of sleep quite yet. The stale, warm air surrounding you has just started to tug you back into dreamland when realization starts to slowly seep into the back of your mind.

Pillow? You swear you didn't bring any, though the softness you're nuzzling into begs to differ. Stale Air? But you're sleeping outside...

You slowly open a single eye, trying to make sense of this. You realize must've burrowed deeper into the sleeping bag during your rest, as you can feel its warmth embrace you from all sides. Only a bit of light pours in through the opening ahead, but you can still see the prone form of the Celebi you encountered yesterday laying just before you. Looking down you discover your pillow, barely being able to discern the wide soles of two very familiar feet in the darkness. Their plush surface must have lovingly supported your sleeping head throughout the night. You silently curse yourself. How do you keep ending up in these situations?

One of the feet rises up and slowly starts rubbing along your cheek, like it senses your distress and wishes to comfort you. Or it misses the warmth your face provided throughout the night, and is now attempting to reclaim it..

You tiredly gaze up at the green fairy, expecting her to be looking back with that familiar smirk of hers, eager to start another day of playtime. Instead she still looks fast asleep, the foot having either developed a mind of its own or being urged onward by her dreams.

You briefly wonder what she's dreaming about. Maybe it's about you, and she's happily tormenting your dream-self underneath her feet again. Maybe he's even eagerly playing along? Enthusiastically serving and worshiping them without her even having to ask. You quickly decide you don't really care. While she's preoccupied in her dreams, you're free from her games and psychic encouragement to participate.

You remove your face from her affectionate foot and shift towards the side of the cloth cave, trying to catch some more sleep. It's not long before the playful foot returns however. This time gently rubbing against your forehead, before trailing down your nose and nestling itself against your mouth. Its tip gently flicks at your bottom lip before retreating and resting on top of your head. You faintly taste something on your lips. Salty and... Tomato? Right. She never did wash them properly before going to sleep, did she?

You decide to take another glance towards the grass type, She's either really good at faking it, or she's still soundly asleep. You see her roll over and, before you know it, her second foot joins the first in its fun. It slides over your hair and slowly pats against your cheek and chin. You realize your face is feeling slightly moist wherever the pair passes. They must've started to sweat, confined in depths of the stuffy sleeping bag.

You dejectedly accept you're not getting any more rest, the feet frolicking over your face sure to stop any attempt. The next best thing would be to climb out of the confined space into fresh air to get a few moments of peace and quiet before Celebi wakes up. But, looking at the distant opening of your sleeping bag, you realize getting out might be harder than you had hoped. Now that you're not sleeping side by side anymore, the dreaming pokemon has eagerly abused her newfound freedom and laid claim to as much space as she could. You're not sure if you can shimmy past without bumping into her and accidentally waking her up. You're unsure how fast she sleeps and how her morning temper is, and you're not sure you want to find out either.

Then again, the only other option is staying put, effectively volunteering your face as a toy for her feet until she wakes up on her own terms. An offer you're sure the playful pair currently exploring said face would be all too eager to abuse. Further, you also doubt you'll like her reaction when she wakes up and finds that you've already willingly submerged yourself beneath her feet. It's bound to make Celebi ecstatic though, so maybe it will be worth it in the long run?

You...
1111221212122.title: ... she shrugs and curls up beside you.

11112212121221.content:
Upon deciding that your face is no toy for this sleeping fairy, and that you don't want to spend another minute with her feet crawling up and down it, you decide to take the risk and try to climb out of the sleeping bag.

So, determined to get out, you focus on your first task: pull her feet off your face.

Carefully, but impatiently, you get a hold of Celebi's left ankle, and as gently as you can, you pull her foot off your face and lay it on the padded floor, before doing the same thing with its twin counterpart. Then, you rise your head, to see if the fairy woke up in the process.

Luckily, she didn't. You see her letting out a light moan, but her black eyelids remain sealed, meaning that she's still fast asleep.

‘Good’ you think to yourself as you mentally prepare to accomplish your second goal: getting out of here.

As slowly and carefully as you can, you start crawling forward, in direction of the opening, but also towards the green, living barrier that lays in front of it.

Sighing lowly, you start crawling through the right space between her and one of the walls of the sleeping bag, your body making contact with hers.
"Biii..." you hear the fairy moaning again.

You halt, holding your breath, fearing that even the slightest noise would call the fairy back to reality. You definitely prefer her asleep.

You start crawling again but, just as you're side by side with Celebi again, the fairy rolls on her side, her long arms wrapping around your neck.

Your heart skips a beat as you wait for either her to wake up and finds herself like this or she lets go of you so you can resume your task and get out.

Seconds pass, minutes even, but the fairy gives no sign of wanting to wake up or get off you. You feel her warm breath being blown in your face as she snores softly.

Suddenly, you feel something poking your lower body and, looking down, you discover that it's her feet again!

One of the two gently rubs itself on your midsection, while the other insistently (and less gently) pokes your belly. It's almost like they missed your face, and they're pleading you to get back inside to 'play'.

You watch them rub themselves around your lower body, when the fairy suddenly moves hers upwards, both legs rising themselves and almost kicking you in the stomach.

And, showing an incredible flexibility, the fairy lays both her feet on your chest, while her arms are still wrapped around your neck. And, from this shorter distance, the grassy smell of her scented feet starts to travel up to your nose, making its way inside your nostrils. Even when you got pretty used to it, it still is annoying.

"Not again..." you mutter to yourself as you opt for a hasty decision. You carefully grab Celebi by her sides, and gently try to push her off.

But the fairy has a solid grasp around your neck, and plus, she has no intention of letting go.
"Come on Celebi, get off!" you cry as you finally manage to wrest the fairy off you and laying her as far from you as you can - which is a really short distance.

Taking advantage of this newfound freedom, you once again starting crawling and, with no living barrier getting in the way anymore, you soon reach the opening of the padded sack and crawl out.

For the first time since you're awake, you manage to breath in fresh air. Pure, fresh, wonderful fresh air, that isn't the stuffy one present in the sleeping bag, nor the scented one emanated from the feet of your 'captress'.

As soon as you fully get out, you get away from the sleeping bag. Not that you want to run away though. You need your original size back first.

But, for now, you just need to put a good distance between you and the green fairy, who is still sleeping soundly inside of your sleeping bag.

Sighing, you go sit down in front of a tree, leaning with your back against the trunk.

And you remain perfectly still, doing nothing but inhaling the morning air to counter the smell of Celebi's feet that is still very present in your nose.

Until you notice something moving inside your sleeping bag. And you hear a loud cry:
"Biiii!" you assume the the fairy just yawned.

Slowly you get up and walk towards the bag, deciding to check if the fairy woke up. You figure out that if she finds you too far from her, she'll assume that you wanted to flee, and she'll simply shrink you down to size as a punishment...

You shudder at the thought, and halt in front of the sleeping bag, looking into the opening to see...
11112212121221.title: A hard task

choices: You improvise a bed to catch some more sleep.
111122121212212.content:
Celebi's still sleeping. You breathe a sigh of relief. You're not sure if you could handle her antics so soon after waking up. You walk around a bit to shake the stiffness from your limbs while greedily gulping down the clean forest air. Your enjoyment of the fresh air is short lived, as the familiar odor of the grass-type's soft soles quickly floods your nose again. Confused, you try again. But despite your best efforts to replace the scent of the fairy's feet with the smell of fresh pine, you can't seem to get rid of it. You must have slept on the pokémon's soles longer than you thought, filling your lungs with their fragrance for hours on end. Now happily nestled within you, it looks like you'll get to keep enjoying their aroma every time you exhale. At least for a while, until it clears out of your system.

You quickly look around to shift your mind to something else, away from the idea that her feet managed to ingrain themselves into you in some way. Your gaze stops on Celebi herself, still happily dreaming. Although... she seems more restless than you remember. Her closed eyes are clearly frowning, and you can see her fists clench tightly into the fabric of the sleeping bag. You briefly worry that something might be wrong with her, but then a movement from within the bedroll catches your attention. Something's frantically moving around in there. For a second, you believe some kind of insect pokémon became trapped in there, before you realize the more likely explanation.

It's her feet looking for their newest little toy - you. You can't be certain how your face's presence against her soles influenced her dreams, but it's clear its sudden absence is now also having an effect. Seeing the sleeping pokémon in distress like this, you actually feel a bit sorry for her. She obviously isn't trying to purposefully hurt you, you're certain you'd know pretty quickly if she was. And yes, while definitely not pleasant, the feeling of her feet pushing and prodding at you isn't the worst you've ever experienced. This is all just a great big game to her, and you just took her fun away. Maybe you should just...

No. You quickly shake your head, trying to physically force that train of thought out of your mind. You're not even sure where that came from.

Looking back down at the grass-type it's clear that, despite her restless fidgeting, she'll be sleeping for a good while longer. You could do with some more shut-eye of yourself. Though, unwilling to venture back into the bedroll and put yourself at the mercy of her feet once again, you'll have to figure something else out. Maybe you could drag over a spare shirt from your bag to double as a mattress and blanket. Ofcourse, if she wakes up before you, you'll probably be waking up to a face-full of fairy feet.

Alternatively, you can ignore your lingering drowsiness and start preparing breakfast. The smell will probably wake her up faster, but maybe a decent meal will put her in a good enough mood to keep her games to a minimum.
111122121212212.title: Celebi is still asleep...

choices: Celebi wakes up first, and she's in a playful mood...
You wake up first and start preparing breakfast
1111221212122121.content:
Even if you can feel your own stomach growling softly, asking to be satisfied, you decide that you might as well catch five more minutes of well-desired sleep.

After all, even when the fairy's sleep is disturbed by the sudden lack of you in the sleeping bag, she won't be waking up for a good while, in which you get to sleep without being subjected to the smell of her feet nor them using your face as a toy.

It's a too tempting chance and you can't possibly miss it. Nor you want to miss it.

So, yawning again, you make your way towards your bag, which is laying near the bedroll where a certain time traveler is sleeping.

A sudden thought makes you stop your walking.

If you make too much noise, the fairy will wake up.

If the noise wakes the fairy up, and she finds you - her toy - nowhere in sight, she could be annoyed.

If the fairy is annoyed, she'll shrink you down and use you as a foot-toy again.

The blood momentarily leaves your face at the perspective. As a result, you go pale as death itself.

Quite certainly, you don't wish to be used as a foot-toy again, forced to worship and lick the feet of that mischievous legendary.

But, again, your lack of sleep manifests itself in yet another, deep yawn finding its way out of your mouth.
"I'll make sure that I don't make too much noise." you drowsily mumble to yourself as you walk up to your bag.

The bag is still bigger than you, meaning that it would be impossible for you to reach inside of it without having to push it on the ground.

But you quickly discard the idea. That would surely make noise. So, you put your drowsy brain to work. And, soon, you get an idea.

Sighing, you get a hold of the bag and, not without difficulty, you drag it to a nearby, fallen log. You push the bag against it, before climbing on the log. This position grants you easy access to your bag, and you quickly dig yourself into it, only to emerge from it with one of your spare shirts, which is currently at least twice your height.

You place it down on the log next to you, before digging into the bag again, this time grabbing a hold of a bag of cotton wool you had brought along with you, in case you got injured.

Sadly, the bag is wedged between something. You pull harder, and you luckily manage to pull it out without making the slightest noise.

Sighing in relief, you grab the objects to improvise a decent bed and you leap off the log, starting to walking to your previous spot, as far as possible from your sleeping bag, near some random tree.

But, as you walk, your bag happens to fall down, producing a non-indifferent noise because of the pots that are inside of it.

You abruptly halt, and bite your lower lip, fearing that the noise might have woken Celebi up.

That'd be really bad for your intentions of getting a few more moments of shut-eye.

Almost mechanically, you glance back at your bedroll. And your blood almost freezes as you see the fairy yawning:
"Biiiiii!" for a moment, you watch as she rolls in her sleep.

But, much to your relief, those black eyelids of hers don't part like you expected, remaining sealed instead. Only then you dare to breath again.

So, once you made sure that the fairy is still fast asleep, you gently place the shirt on the ground and lay down on it. It's large enough to even wrap it around yourself like a blanket. Then, you proceed to place the cotton wool beneath your head. It's nothing near your sleeping bag, but at least you won't be sleeping on the grass. Better than nothing, you guess.

You close your eyes and, relieved to have at least a short break from Celebi's feet being anywhere on your body, you relax.

You also take notice that the persistent smell of the time traveler's feet is finally starting to find its way out from your poor lungs, fresh air emanated from the trees starting to replace the scented one that bothered you for... you don't even know how much time you spent with her feet already!

Soon, your drowsiness sweetly claims your consciousness as you fall asleep again...
1111221212122121.title: Five more minutes of sleep

choices: She's clueless and accepts your explanation
She knows what really happened during the night. Uh-oh.
11112212121221211.content:
Your sleep is disturbed by a sudden weight on your legs. It's not painful, or even uncomfortable. You shift your legs a bit underneath it. It feels malleable through your improvised blanket, and slightly warm. You try to ignore the feeling and return back to sleep's welcome embrace.

Oddly, the weight seems to be gradually increasing. Not too long after it's joined by a twin, this one covering most of your belly and chest. A muffled giggle appears from somewhere above, and the weight on your chest also starts to grow. Recognizing you won't be able to catch sleep again under the mysterious assault, you groggily open your eyes to find the cause of your interrupted nap.

You easily spot the culprit. Celebi is standing on top of your prone body. Her back foot is on your legs, while the other one rests on top of your chest. She seems to be trying her hardest to stop herself from bursting out laughing while stepping on you. A confused grunt from you catches her attention, and she gleefully smiles down at you. Slowly and deliberately, she raises her back foot off your legs and guides it to hover over your face. You see its bottom is once again covered in crushed grass and dirt. She flashes you one last cocky grin before planting it firmly on top of your face, smothering it in the soft warmth of her big, green sole.

It's not long before its weight starts to increase again, and you realize you should probably get her off. You try to do so, but you've barely lifted your arms before the foot leaves you of its own accord to join its mistress above you. You crane your neck up to see what she's doing and find that, having run out of you to walk on, the time-traveler spins around and takes a seat just above your head, planting both feet on either side of your it.

"Mhm... Good morning Celebi". You try, deciding not to question her morning walk on top of you for now.

"Bii", the pokemon happily responds.

"Bi Bi Biii Bi?", she tries.

At your confused expression, she tries again. This time pointing to you, then herself and then your empty bedroll. Then to you again, and finally to your improvised bed.

"Ah, you want to know why I got out of the sleeping bag?"

"Bi!" She happily nods.

"Well, I...-" You trail off, feeling an odd sensation against your cheek. A sideways glance reveals that it's her foot, lovingly caressing you as Celebi listens patiently to your explanation. The feeling of her sole rubbing along your cheek reminds you of her feet's nightly excursion over your face. You look up at her alarmed. Does she know? It doesn't look like it, she's just waiting for you to continue.

"W-Well..." you try again, stammering this time. Her foot's affectionate display towards your face keeps your mind drifting back to the gentle nudges and strokes it received from them during the night. You can't let her know what happened. "Y-You see, us being stuck together like that, I couldn't really get comfortable. You seemed fast asleep already, so I snuck out and made a bed of my own to sleep in".

Celebi looks at you questioningly. She clearly picked up on your change in demeanor. You see her eyes closing, as she ponders your answer.
