Oh no, you realize. Celebi is a psychic type. She couldn't be trying to read your mind, could she? You try to calm yourself down a little. If Celebi could read minds, you're certain it'd be something more widely known. Then again, you haven't heard any stories of Celebi shrinking people down either.

You nervously wait for a reaction from the green pokemon.
11112212121221211.title: Celebi wakes up first, and she's in a playf...

choices: Celebi points to her feet... she's eager to start playing...
She wants to try another kind of game...
111122121212212111.content:
You lay there, awaiting for the fairy's reply to your explanation, hoping that she'll buy it.
"Bii," you hear her muttering as she processes your words. Her foot keeps rubbing the side of your face as she thinks.

Then, Celebi opens her eyes again and smiles.
"Bi!" she exclaims happily. It sounded like ‘Okay!’ so you assume that she's pleased with your explanation.

Sighing in relief, you close your eyes, trying to catch one more minute of relax.

But, of course, Celebi won't let you.

She's awake now, and it means that a great new day of games with her toy had just begun.

"Bii!" she giggles, hovering upwards and shoving one of her feet into your face, the smell hitting your nose as the foot physically assaults your face.
‘Get up, you lazy toy!’ she seems to be saying.

"Alright! Alright, I'm awake!" you huff with a not-so-subtle hint of annoyance as you move a hand to get a hold of Celebi's foot, removing it from your face.

"Bi!" Celebi giggles again as you unwrap your shirt from your body and rise your head from the bag of cotton wool.

"Happy now?" you growl, before yawning loudly while your hands travel to your eyes as you start rubbing them, deliberately doing it as slowly as you can, not quite willing to start another day as a toy to this time traveling grass type fairy.

You open your eyes again and look at Celebi, who stares back at you with an expectant look.
"Bi~iii!" she sings, rising her foot to your face and repeatedly pointing at it with one of her paws.

"Are you already eager to play?" you ask, not sure of how she could be so cheerful so early in the morning. Celebi shakes her head almost frenetically, and points at her foot with more energy.

"Wait. I don't know about you, but I, uh, need something in my stomach before... 'playing'," you remark. As if wanting to help you, your stomach growls in this precise moment, asking to be filled with the first one of its daily meals.
"Hear that?" you say.

Celebi's smirk drops, but nonetheless she lowers her foot down as she nods her head in an understanding manner. Soon enough, you hear her stomach growling as well, suggesting the reason of why she's letting your refusal slide so easily.

"Hungry?" you unnecessarily ask with a smirk as you make your way to your bag, which is still laying on the ground in front of the fallen log where you left it when you got asleep again.

--

You emerge from your bag holding a bottle of moomoo milk, a few Lava Cookies and a sitrus berry. You remember Celebi using your soup as a foot bath yesterday evening.

For a moment, you wonder if she could do the same with your milk, before deciding that it's a stupid idea. There is difference between a pot and a bottle after all, her feet would luckily never fit in the second one.

You take a seat on the log, the green fairy sitting next to you.
"Here, try one of these," you mutter as you hand her a Lava Cookie, before biting in your own meal.

You watch as the fairy hesitantly bites her cookie, before deciding that it's not only edible, but delicious! You choke back a laugh and watch as she devours the whole cookie in two bites.

--

You take one last sip of milk, before letting out a satisfied sigh, meaning that you're full. And, judging from the pleased look on her face, Celebi is as well. Which is a good thing.

A pleased Celebi means a reduced chance of being shrunk and used as a foot toy from her today.

Lost in your own thoughts, you don't even feel a green paw belonging to a certain time traveler poking you repeatedly.

"Bi!" this cry effectively stops your train of thought. That and the green fairy's paw making contact with your side, hitting you with a somewhat painful blow.

"Ow!" you cry as you look at her with annoyance, silently asking the reason of why she just hit you. In response, the fairy smirks that familiar smirk of hers.

The annoyance fades from your face as you recognize that expectant look, the same one she uses whenever Celebi wants to play...
111122121212212111.title: Rise and shine!

1111221212122121111.content:
You knew it was inevitable. Still, you look away, trying to ignore her silent command.

"Biiiiiii" The Celebi whines, trying to catch your attention, to get you to start.

"Listen, Celebi", you start, "Can't we first....".

"Bi!", she cuts you off, looking sternly at you before pointing decisively at her feet one last time. Knowing that further refusal would only encourage the fairy to use her psychic prowess against you again, you relent. You sit up straight, and halfheartedly motion the time-traveler to take a seat as well. Seeing that you've decided to obey, the fairy's frown is quickly replaced by a wide smile as she plops her but down onto the ground and eagerly presents her green soles to you once more.

Having resigned yourself to the task at hand, you gently lift up her left foot and place it into your lap. You look over to Celebi, expecting her to show you exactly what she wants you to do. Instead, you see that the fairy has laid flat on her back, eyes closed. Her foot starts tapping against your stomach, encouraging you to get started. It seems like she's content to let you decide what to do this time.

Uncertain, you reach over to your blanket/shirt. You'd already seen an up close view how her soles were once again littered with bits of plants, pebbles and sand, and decided to remedy that first. Using the shirt like an ordinary rag, you swipe away the larger bits of debris clinging to her foot before putting more effort in rubbing away the more stubborn smudges of dirt off her sole. Once you manage to get the foot clean, you give decide to give it a massage. You place one hand right next to her heel, the other underneath the ball of her foot, before pressing your thumbs deep into her malleable skin. It's evident you're doing something right, as Celebi starts softly murmuring in approval, pushing her foot deeper into your caring hands.

The job is made much easier this time by your increased size, and soon you find yourself kneading at parts of the sole you swear you'd already tended too. You're uncertain how to continue. While Celebi clearly doesn't mind, you don't want to spend the entire day tending to her feet. However, you also don't want to risk annoying her by stopping too soon. You look over to her face again, hoping for a signal to allow you to start on lefty's twin, but the relaxed pokemon hasn't opened her eyes since you started.

Unable to think of another way to cut the massage short without raising her ire, you slowly raise her foot until it's level with your head, and gently bring it closer to your face. You feel the ball of her foot bump against your forehead and stop, hesitant to proceed. You can see the small wrinkles covering her sole, feel the faint smell of grass fill your nose once again. The top of her foot lovingly strokes your hair, seemingly sensing what is about to happen and urging you to continue, eager to feel your lips against its fragrant skin. Closing your eyes, you push past your doubts and press your lips into the warm sole covering your face. you feel the muscles underneath tense and shift, as if trying to return the gesture. Before you can even wonder how long you should hold the kiss, the decision is made for you. The foot slowly lowers of its own accord to reveal a pair of big, blue eyes staring right at you.

Time seems to stand still as you look into each others eyes. But then, slowly but surely, an impossibly big smile starts to spread over Celebi's face.

The smile, and the rest of her face, quickly get eclipsed by her right foot, still generously coated in the bits and pieces it picked up off the forest floor, which she now enthusiastically starts waving in front of your face.

You curse yourself for encouraging her

"Bi! Bi Bi! Bi!", she happily squeels at you.

"Celebi, wait! Let me expl-mmmfff", you start, before an invisible force pushes your head into the soft embrace of her foot. The rest of your protest is smothered into nothingness against the plush skin as you feel her damp sole mold to your face and flood your mouth with its taste. You desperately to get it off you, but Celebi's psychic prowess keeps her foot glued firmly to your face. Feeling your tongue brush over her sensitive sole during your frantic struggle only emboldens her further.

After you finally - with some difficulty - manage to pry the affectionate foot off your face, you collapse to the ground. You roll over onto your back to try and catch your breath. You only dare to look back at the fairy once you've recovered a bit, and see her glancing back sheepishly. A small blush appears on her cheeks as she realizes she went slightly overboard.

--------------

"Let's uh... let's forget that ever happened", you hesitantly offer once you managed to get back to your feet. The fairy smugly grins at you, before quickly shaking her head.

"Well, could you at least lend a hand in packing up our camp?", you continue dejectedly, "I'd manage on my own at my normal size, but now that everything's more than twice as large..."

Celebi ponders for a moment, before stretching out her hands towards your things. You wonder what she's up too, but then you see you things slowly shrink down, until they're normal sized to you. You look back at the pokemon, but see she's already taken a seat at the foot of a nearby tree, motioning you to get started. You guess you can just be happy for the fact that she didn't try to continue any of her games...

The morning is already half past when you finally manage to pack everything back into your bag.

"Alright, I think i got everything", you exclaim.

"You ready to go?" you ask, as Celebi quickly flies up to you. She doesn't respond, instead taking great interest in the backpack perched on your shoulders. You're about to ask if something was wrong, when she flutters up directly above you. Soon after, you see two very familiar feet descend on either side of you as she takes a seat on top of your pack. Her heels kick lightly against your chest as you feel her paw tap against your scalp.

"Bi!", she exclaims, giving you the command to march. You silently grit your teeth, more out of embarrassment at being used as a pack mule than out of difficulty to carry her, before setting off.

you make some good progress deeper into the forest, before...
1111221212122121111.title: Celebi points to her feet... she's eager to...

choices: Celebi grows into a giantess! Though you may not grow to normal!
11112212121221211112.content:
Celebi let out a sigh. Her boredness was becoming troublesome.
As you saw she was bored, you decide it might be a good chance to try to get big again.
"How about you make me big again, Celebi?" you say with a smile.

"Bi.. Bi, bi!" then you realize she's getting some weird idea.
She hops off of your back and grins down at you, deciding what would happen.
11112212121221211112.title: Celebi grows bored again.

choices: Celebi moves her feet on you, wanting to start playing again...
Celebi turns around showing you her rear, ready for a different approach...
111122121212212111121.content:
You stare at the grass type fairy, who lazily floats around in a bored fashion.

"So? Will you grow me back to normal?" you ask again, not bothering to hide the hope in your voice.

A thought finds its way among the others in your head.

If Celebi grows you back to your original size... how will you manage to get rid of her? The best shot you've got would be running as fast as you can... you quickly discard the idea.

A wrong step, and Celebi would incapacitate you with her psychic powers, shrink you down to a microscopic size again and use you as a foot toy again.

Something you don't want to experience again.

However, your hopes are shattered, and a loud sigh escapes your mouth as you see Celebi turning around and shaking her head, responding to your previous question.

"Fine." you mumble.
"Let's get going then." you turn around, starting to walk again, not even letting the fairy hop on top of your bag again. Carrying her is the last thing you wish for right now.

However, you take the little amount of five steps before being forced to stop, a cyan energy surrounding you. Soon enough, Celebi enters your eyesight again as she flutters in front of you. Her half-lidded eyes tell you one thing: she's bored.

And, with a good chance, she wants to play again...

However, you feign obliviousness, hoping that you're wrong about her intentions.
"What?" you ask as the psychic energy around you dies down, letting you move freely again.
"Biii..." Celebi says, pointing down.

Not at her feet like you expected, though. She's pointing to the ground, you notice.
"Y-You... you want to stop...?" you question. The fairy nods, before rising one of her legs, showing you the wide, green sole of her right foot. One of the fingers of her paw points at it.

A loud, annoyed scream echoes from the depths of your mind.
"You want to play again, don't you?" you ask. Celebi nods.

"Come on, Celebi, we're supposed to be getting out of the forest..." you complain, hoping to make her give up on the idea of playing.

However, the fairy is stubborn.
"Bi!" she exclaims, waving her paws back and forth.

You huff, knowing that she won't accept further complaining. You remove your bag from your shoulders and unceremoniously toss it aside on the ground.

Celebi's frown is replaced by a wide smile as she sits down, you doing the same. She pushes both her feet into your stomach, knocking the air out of your lungs.

As you inhale deeply to regain your breath, you try to figure out what should you do. You already massaged... worshipped the fairy's feet earlier, and it had disastrous results...

Not only that, but you fear that if you're too monotonous with your work, she won't be too pleased...

Sensing your hesitation, and not feeling your touch on her feet, the grass type opened her eyes again.
"Bi? Bi!" she exclaims, first curious, then impatient.

"I don't know what to do!" you snap back, irritated. Only to immediately regret speaking.

A sly smirk appears on the time traveler's face.
"Bi..." she says.

Suddenly, her bright blue eyes become even brighter as they glow azure...
"Ah!" you exclaim, startled, knowing what that glow is.

You fall back on your rear and try to get away, but the psychic energy soon engulfs you again.

Much to your horror, your surroundings start to grow bigger and bigger as you are yet again shrunk down to size by the green fairy, who watches with glee your size getting drained by her psychic powers.

Soon, the shrinking comes to an end. And you find yourself staring up at a monolithic Celebi, whose eyes stop glowing as a smug smile takes place on her face.

You gulp down as you watch the now gigantic fairy getting up and hovering above you.
"Bi~ii!" the giantess laughs at you.

You let out a frustrated cry. Laughing is the last thing you'd do now.

There.

It happened again. The fairy made you her shrunken human toy again.

Celebi soon stops laughing, and her gaze travels back on you as the giantess figures out what to do first.
111122121212212111121.title: Back to being a toy...

choices: Celebi stood up, wanting to step on you!
Celebi's feet grabbed a hold of you, beginning to grind you in between!
1111221212122121111211.content:
As she regarded your pitifully small body in the ground with that malicious smirk of hers, Celebi thought about what to do with you now.

You had no idea of what to do, huh? That was no problem, she had plenty of ideas about what you could have done to her precious little feet.

For starters, you could have...

Celebi lost her grin for a second; in front of you, your nemeses touched the ground as the fairy landed, looking deep in thought. You saw the smelly twins fidgeting on the ground, probably preparing themselves for your ‘performance’, coating themselves in dirt which you latterly had to remove, either with your hands or, dreadfully, with your tongue.

"C-Celebi?" you called out, trying to sound firm, but failing poorly. You've already been through this once, and it had been relatively harmless, but you still couldn't get used to the idea of being so tiny, helpless and, above all, powerless to stop the giant time-traveler from doing whatever she wanted with you.

Said pokemon looked still deep in thought, probably coming up with new ways to use her feet to ‘play’ with you, which meant an endless torture until she declared herself satisfied.

As for Celebi, she still couldn't find anything that you hadn't already done to her grass-scented feet.

You watched as the giant fairy in front of you carelessly sat down, causing the ground beneath you to tremble while causing you to fall on your own butt as well.

Somewhat startled, but glad that you currently weren't under her butt, you looked back up at Celebi, discovering that she was staring down at you intently.

"Bi." she said as her left paw rose, two of her fingers bending twice, before pointing to her foot as she beckoned you to get closer to it.

You sighed resignedly, knowing that you had to obey if you wanted your size back.

Begrudgingly, you slowly walked up to her towering sole, which was familiarly covered in crushed grass and sand.

You paled at the thought that you were probably going to lick it clean again. Your stomach growled, protesting loudly at the disgusting meal that was being offered to it.

"Bi." the owner of the foot drew your attention, causing you to look back at her.

Much to your delight, she was rubbing something invisible with her paw, before said paw pointed to you.

She wanted another simple foot-rub, you thought while silently thanking the giantess.

Slowly, you placed both your hands on her sole and began rubbing off the dirt, which happily transferred from her foot to your palms.

You groaned in disgust, while Celebi began moaning, pleased.

In the meantime, the mind of the fairy kept working as she tried to find new ways to play with you.

Quite a few involving your mouth came up, and she smiled at the idea of you licking or maybe kissing her sole, but a new one made her discard the scenario.

An eager smirk crawled across her face.

Since she had ‘captured’, she thought, you have been doing all the work. But now, it was going to be the exact opposite.

You weren't going to do anything, just stand still, while her feet had their way with you.

The time-traveler smirked even more widely as she stared at you, who were still busily rubbing her foot, worried by the sudden lack of pleased moans escaping the fairy.

She allowed herself to sigh contentedly as she watched you working.

You just had to finish this foot-rub. Then, you were going to ‘relax’, the fairy thought with a creepy grin.

--

112.title: Mawile

1121.content:
You are a young trainer, trying to make your way through Granite Cave. Unfortunately, an encounter with a trainer much stronger than you left all of your Pokemon fainted, and you had no choice but to retreat out of the depths of the cave back to Dewford Town, where a Pokemon Center awaited.

You could see rays of light ahead and knew the exit of the cave was just around the next bend. Before you could reach the turn, a wild female Mawile leapt out of the shadows! Normally, encountering a Pokemon with no usable Pokemon would be extremely bad, but considering the small size and weak natures of Mawiles, you felt confident this one was not going to harm you.

As you crouched down to shoo the Mawile away, you found that your confidence was misplaced. The Mawile rushed forward and delivered a shattering Sucker Punch to your face! You hit the ground instantly and found your conscious slipping away. The last thing you saw before you were knocked out was the Mawile jumping up and down on your chest.

As you reawakened, you found yourself in an isolated part of Granite Cave, sitting up against the cave's wall. The first thing you did was try to reach for your face to make sure nothing was broken, but you found you could not move your arms. Or your legs, for that matter. You looked down and saw your legs were bound in... Wurmple silk? You tried not to panic and assessed your surroundings.

A few feet away, you noticed a Mawile, which you assumed is the same one that punched you. Now that you were able to get a better look at her, you noticed she looked very different than other Mawiles. She had a very curvy, feminine figure, complete with small lumps on her chest resembling breasts. Additionally, instead of her feet having two toes like all other Mawiles, both of her feet had a full set of five toes each.

As you were examining her, she noticed you were awake, smirked, and began to slowly walk toward you. With every step she took, your heart rate raised and sweated more and more. After what she did to you earlier, the thought of being completely helpless against anything she may try to do to you filled you with dread and anxiety. She finally got right in front of you, and, shockingly, sat on your legs.

To your surprise, she lifted up both of her feet to your face. You could see they were covered in filth, the blackish-brown dirt contrasting against her pure black feet. The next thing you noticed was the smell. Her feet positively reeked, and smelled worse than anything you could imagine at the moment. You couldn't help but gag, to her delight. The Mawile giggled and wiggled her toes. As her nasty toes wiggled, you could see mounds of dirt caked between them.

The next thing she did was press her filthy feet against her face. The spot on your jaw where she punched you stung as she pressed against it, but the pain wasn't unbearable, so you assume it thankfully wasn't broken. As the feet rubbed against your face, you could feel both the dirt and the stench smear into your skin, leaving your face as disgusting as the Mawile's feet. You had no idea why she was doing this, but you theorized that, by rubbing her scent onto you, she was marking you as her property to other Pokemon

After a few minutes of rubbing her feet on your face, she pulled her feet back, pointed her right foot toward you, wiggled her nasty toes, and began using them to prod at your mouth. After a few pokes, she began scowling and prodding more aggressively, obviously expecting you to open your mouth. You would never, ever, EVER wish to have her filthy foot anywhere near you, let alone in your mouth, but you fear that if you refuse, you'll be punished. After that Sucker Punch, you don't think you could possibly take any more pain this Mawile can dish out.

What do you do?

You coughed and gagged on the rancid foot as the Mawile wiggled her toes inside your mouth gleefully. The foot tasted absolutely vile! Turning back around and crushing your ribs in the process, the Makuhita grumbled and slapped a thick, meaty foot on your face. The sole alone was the largest and widest you’ve ever seen; so large and wide, in fact, that your face sunk into the sweaty, filthy flesh, like a base being used for a mold. Makuhita gently—if you could call anything a fighting-type does ‘gentle’—rubbed her foot back and forth against your head, making sure your tongue is nice and plastered against her sole. Unlike Mawile’s feet, the salty smack of hard-earned sweat was much more prevalent in the overall taste of the arch. You’d honestly prefer if you just had to clean these feet, as slick as they were, if it meant getting away from the others—Wait, no! I don’t want to clean their feet at all! What the hell…

Unexpectedly, there wasn’t actually too much dirt on the underside; the main problem, though, was the smell. Many kinds of sweat; fresh, old, wet, dry, and muddy, all congregated on the fighting-type’s massive wall of a foot, and with your mouth fully occupied, the only choice you had was to inhale through your nose, which was wedged deeply in the space between her big and second toes. Even worse, her weight on your chest made it harder to breathe, necessitating your breaths to be deep and sharp. Each huff you took was infused with a rank cocktail of these flavors, the vinegary stench being much more potent than that of your initial tormentor. And it was growing stronger by the second! You couldn’t exactly use your eyes to see, what with them being filled with the sight of sweaty, pudgy toes that you’d inevitably have to suck, but you could definitely tell that Makuhita was getting a bit…excited, at your submission to her. She scrubbed your face more firmly with her foot, really getting your tongue in there, and giving her sole a deep cleaning.

Eventually, she lifted her foot off of your face and inspected your handiwork. Satisfied enough, she grinned down at you and hovered her toes in front of your slightly open mouth. Weirdly enough, she didn’t just jam them down your throat. You look her in the eyes, and she responds by pointing a finger down at her wide digits and wiggling them in your face. Oh god, you realize, she wants me to do it myself. Just…crane my neck up and suck on her toes. Just when you thought you couldn’t get any more emasculated, here you were, stuck between a rock and a hard place.

Before you can ponder whether or not to keep the last shard of dignity you have left, you feel a firm pressure on your crotch and an electric zap up your spine; straining to look over the form of your rotund tormentor, you see Mawile pressing her heel straight down on your cock. She meets your gaze, waves and giggles deviously, then twists her foot, grinding it against your half-chub—which was growing embarrassingly fast. A hot rush spreads through your gut, and your head feels fuzzy and warm. A little groan sneaks through your lips before you realize. You gulp, panicking on the inside.

Fuck, fuck fuck fuck FUCK…!

I am not a Pokephile…

Unfortunately, it looked like these girls were trying to change your mind. Makuhita seemed almost entranced in your reaction. After getting a good look at your panting, blushing face and unfocused eyes, she actually rolls off of you, unburdening your chest. You take the precious break time you have to gulp down some nice, relatively fresh air—even the stale, murky depths of Granite Cave had nothing on these pokemon’s feet.

Makuhita seems to be having a conversation with the others; at least that stopped Mawile from touching your co—

Spoke too soon… you thought, feeling one of the fighting-type’s large hands grab your member from inside your shorts, squeezing it a couple times, as if to make a point. Another slight moan escapes your throat, and you can hear her snicker a bit. Mawile seems…miffed?

Shit, are these pokemon crushing on me?!

Your moment of peace is broken as you inhale the funky scent of her peds, quite small in comparison to the ones you just faced, but no less potent. Speaking of, one of them approached you, looking a bit less excited than before, but nonetheless ready to have some fun at the expense of your dignity and olfactory senses. You hazard a reluctant guess that whoever's not working your head is probably going to work your 'little head'.

You were taking a walk through the forest. No reason in particular, you just like doing that. It relaxes your mind. But little you know that you are being watched.

Absentmindedly, you walk towards a tree and sit down, leaning with your back against your trunk.

In a matter of seconds, you lose consciousness and fall asleep; in the meantime, the tune changes.

If by any chance the first melody didn't do its job, you would have seen yourselves rapidly diminishing in height. And, soon, you lay there, unconscious, and as tall as a common bug.

The melody finally ends. From the branches of the trees above, a green headed, blue eyed pokemon smirks. Her powers did their job...

--

"Melo! Melo!" a voice cries. You adjust your position in your sleep.
"Mel!" the voice repeats. This time, something starts to shake you.

Mumbling something in your sleep, you adjust again.

"Mel!" with this loud cry, you suddenly feel a sharp pain taking over your body, successfully waking you up.

Your eyes shut open, and the first thing you notice is a white, slim pillar putting pressure on your chest, pinning you down, keeping you still, knocking the air out of your lungs and, most of all, causing you pain.

Coughing a bit, you slowly gaze upwards. You manage to make out the silhouette of a giant pokemon. It has green hair, blue eyes and a black 'dress'. Also, the pillar currently pinning you down, you realize, is its foot...

"Meloetta!" it cries upon seeing you awake, telling you what pokemon it is.

You know about Meloetta that she is admired by many because of her unique songs.

So... that melody you heard before...

"Mel!" she cries again, interrupting your thoughts by stepping on you harder, making you yelp in pain.

"S-Stop! Please!" you cry out in pain. The giantess smirks. She likes your pleads. It makes her feel... powerful. And she's sure that this new toy of hers will just make her day better.

Slowly, she lifts her foot off you, and leans down, roughly grabbing you with her black paw.

Meloetta takes your previous place as she sits down where you were being crushed not even a second ago. You're really glad that you're not currently under her butt.

But your relief is short lived as the dual-typed legendary leans forward, moving you towards her feet and placing you down in front of the white pillars.
"Melo!" she exclaims, bringing her paws in front of herself, and starting to rub an invisible surface, before pointing to you by her feet.

It takes a while for you to understand that she just instructed you to worship her feet.

You look upwards, trying to put up some resistance, but a mere look to the legendary tells you that any attempt of protest would end poorly for you.

Everything's happening too fast for you too handle. You just woke up, and found yourself shrunk and at the mercy of a singing giantess who just ordered you to worship her feet.

"Melo!" she cries impatiently, wagging her feet in front of you, eager to receive your servicing. And, more importantly, how will you face you if she catches you?

Those are two good points against running away. Plus, you obviously need your previous size back, and maybe, if you do as Meloetta wants, maybe she'll restore you.

But, you don't really want to humiliate yourself by worshipping the feet of a pokemon. And, even if running wouldn't exactly be a bold choice, it is far better than the alternative.

Your eyes open up with your mind's command. The first thing you notice is that you're no longer where you were before being knocked unconscious.

You're in a small cave instead, the rock walls barely visible in all this darkness...

Your eyes fully adjust to your dark surroundings, and you notice two creatures standing before you.

One of them is unknown to you. But the other - the color drains from your face as you take a good look at it.

Red eyes, purple body and a sinister, wide-open-mouth grin. A Gengar.

Your gaze shifts on the other creature, the one that apparently knocked you out earlier. Black, small body, funny shape of head and red eyes, which are fixed on you.

"Shad, shadow." the unknown creature says. Its voice is a little more than a simple whisper, yet you detect a feminine tone within it, giving you a close idea of what gender the creature is.

"Gengar." the Gengar speaks up. You notice that it's voice carries the same feminine tone of the other creature.

You take a moment to recollect your thoughts. These two female pokemon knocked you out and kidnapped you. For what reason you couldn't figure out...

The unknown creature looks at the Gengar, and she points at you with a stubby, dark grey finger.
"Marshadow." she cries. Universally, pokemon only speak their names, so you assume that the creature's name is Marshadow.

Whatever she said to Gengar, the ghost/poison type starts snickering in response.
"Gen!" she replies she nodding her head, before turning to you. For some reason, that characteristic grin seems more sinister than before...

The ghost's eyes suddenly glow azure as she stares at you. A blue aura surrounds you, but you find yourself unable to look away. You start to feel very weird, light-headed.

For a moment, you close your eyes.

When you reopen them, the first thing you think is that you must have somehow fell asleep. This must be a dream...

Standing before you are the Marshadow and the Gengar... but they've became giantesses!

... Yet, the cave surrounding you and them didn't even quake... so there's only one logical alternative... the Gengar must have shrunk you down with her powers...

Your attention is drawn as Marshadow walks over you with an unnervingly slow fashion. The giantess stares down at you for a moment, before giggling.
"Sha." she says. For some reason, you interpret this as ‘cute’.

The shadowy pokemon continues:
"Shad shadow." she mutters, ‘You will make a wonderful toy’.

You slowly stand up, staring up at the grey giantess. Slowly, the black pillar that is her left foot rises off the ground and it hovers over you, eclipsing your eyesight even more.

Then, it starts to descend... straight on you!

You close your eyes, bracing yourself for the impact... that never comes.

"Gar!" the Gengar shouts. Marshadow's foot stops in midair as the giantess looks at the purple ghost.
"Sha?"

"Gen, gengar!"

You reopen your eyes. Only to see that Marshadow's facial expression shifted from an amused one to an irritated one. Part of her head turns green as she spreads her arms in protest.

"Shadow!" she shouts, pointing first at you, then to herself.
"Gengar!" the purple ghost emulates her friend's movements. The only difference is that she points to herself in the end.

Realization strikes you. The two giantesses are arguing to decide which one of them is going to 'play' with you first...

Deciding that this is a good moment to try and slip away, you start crawling away from Marshadow's foot.

However, the giantess suddenly turns to look at you.
"Dow!" she shouts, making you halt while also making you physically tremble with fear.

A giant, black paw suddenly gets a hold of you as you're snatched up by the shadowy pokemon, who turns to Gengar.
"Marshadow!" she cries.

"Gengar! Gen gengar!" the poison type replies, clearly demanding the first turn with you, the giantesses' new living toy.

The argument goes on for several minutes more, before the two pokemon finally decide how to mark the end of it...

You realize that this is the moment: you've got to choice, whether to 'play' with Marshadow's feet or with Gengar's. Since your current situation, you don't want to disappoint either of them.

Only after several minutes of stomping your now fragile form, the giantess stops. Still, the pressure doesn't leave your body as she keeps her left foot on you.

Then, it rises just a little bit, giving you a chance to breath.

Beaten, weak, unable to talk properly, you look up to the giantess. Her head returned to its characteristic grey color, but the frown is still present on her face.
"Dow! Sha!" she exclaims, ‘Do that again! See what happens!’.

"I'm so-rry..." you somehow manage to speak. Your words seem to have an effect on the giantess; her gaze shifts into a softer one, and her foot rises from your body.

Then, the giant, dark grey paw of Marshadow reaches you as the pokemon giantess bends, gently picks you up and walks over a dark corner of the cavern.

"Dow." you hear her mutter, her voice returning to its usual low tone. Perhaps she's been a little too harsh with you, but you needed to learn your place. You had been punished enough, she decides.

The giantess thinks to herself. She couldn't let you try to escape again, so she has to keep you close to her somehow.

A giggle escapes her mouth. That's an easy task.

Your world shakes as the pokemon giantess lays down, without losing her grip on you. And you watch with horror as Marshadow...
1133212211.title: Failed attempt

choices: Marshadow slowly took you out of her foot...
She lied to Gengar, wanting to keep you to herself alone
11332122112.content:
Your heart pounded your chest from within; you wanted to scream, but your vocal chords seemed to be unable to produce any sound.

And slowly, unstopped, Marshadow's hand moved to her left foot. Ironically, it was the one that reduced you in the pitiful state you were in right now.

And, unable to even squirm in the grip of the giantess, you could only watch as she moved you in front of her sole, the one sole you licked clean earlier today.

It was no surprise when you saw it once again covered in dirt and small rocks. Did she want you to polish her feet again as a punishment for trying to escape? You sure hoped not...

But your fear of cleaning feet with your tongue turned to be wrong: as you neared the sole, you noticed Marshadow smirking.

It was like she was deliberately taking as much time as possible to subject you to a still unknown torture.

But if finally happened.

Your body touched the towering sole of the foot; then, the paw literally pushed you into it.

You became agitated as your mouth was, once again, invaded by that familiar taste of smoke.

But it wasn't even the beginning.

In fact, as the paw behind you kept pushing, you suddenly found the almost immaterial wall in front of you seemed to melt around you, becoming softer...

"No!" you suddenly retrieved your ability to speak, but you couldn't do anything as you were pushed deeper.

The foot was literally absorbing you.

Your hands rushed to the sole, your feet did too as you tried to pull yourself back; but the more you struggled, the more Marshadow increased the strength of her paw.

Your arms were the first that were sucked into the shadow foot. You tried to pull back by pushing your feet against the hungry sole of Marshadow, but she simply smirked at you, her fiery red eyes glued on your form as she pushed you inside her foot.

A fitting punishment, you sourly thought, since you were the size of an ant and given what Marshadow liked to do with shrunken humans such as yourself.

Your legs were devoured by the shadow foot too.

You gulped: you couldn't feel your limbs anymore, it seemed like they had disappeared behind the other side of the sole.

Your body followed, until just your head was stuck out of the towering sole, a finger of the giantess on top of it.

The shadow pokemon shot you one last, mischievous look, before the finger pushed on your head, and everything disappeared.

Marshadow pulled back, satisfied, and slowly retreat into the shadows.

There was no way the human could escape.

--

The first thing you noticed after your head was absorbed by the foot was that you were in a pitch black place that smelt like Marshadow's feet (no wonder, given where you actually were).

Your cruel entrapment was totally weird, you thought: you were trapped in an almost immaterial but yet very solid place. Coldness surrounded you.

Shortly after your arrival on the other side of the foot, you tried to push yourself out the way you came in, but the foot quickly became touchable again, keeping you from escaping.

"Hey! Let me out!" you screamed, your scream causing the surface within the foot to vibrate.

It was weird to think that you were inside of a pokemon, but you had no time to think: you had to get out.

Sadly, you got no reply.

Trying to use the least amount of oxygen possible, you tried to struggle to get out of here, but you achieved nothing but a giggle (presumably coming from the giantess you were trapped in) causing the whole foot to shake.

You stopped for a moment to study your surroundings.

Your prison wasn't skin-tight, but was nonetheless still very small, like a tiny, circular cage. There was barely space for you to sit down: it was going to be a miracle if you didn't suffer from claustrophobia whenever you got out of here.

If you ever got out of here.

But, on the bright side, there seemed to be enough air for you to breathe. Aside from that, your prison was nothing but a smelly, cold and tight, little cage.

You made a few more meek attempts to get out by struggling, getting Marshadow to giggle again.

Around you was the sound of a drum beating, but you knew that it probably was the heart of the pokemon, so loud because you were inside of her; a secondary, less loud sound that you registered as her breathing could be heard too and, judging by its slowness, Marshadow was probably asleep, but was nonetheless enjoying the massage you were providing in her sleep.

After ten minutes of struggling uselessly, you fell onto the bottom of the smelly paw, exhausted.

You laid down the best you could, resigned to the fact that there was no way to get out unless Marshadow willed it... and you weren't so sure that was something that was going to happen anytime soon.

You closed your eyes, deciding to catch some sleep.

Marshadow was probably going to let you out in the morning.

...

Right?

The last thing you felt before you drifted off was the bad smell of the foot, before that too faded as you fell asleep.

--

Morning came into the cavern where two certain shadow pokemon slept.

Hidden within shadows, the giantess whose body you were sleeping in was sleeping soundly.

Until...

"Gar!"

Two red eyes opened.

"Gengar!"

Slowly, the legendary emerged from the shadows, remembering about her companion.

She found Gengar staring around the cavern with a venomous gaze, and it wasn't hard to understand the reason of it: the human they had shrunken and used like a foot toy was gone.

"Dow?" Marshadow chimed as she stood up, feeling a tingle under her left foot... or in her left foot.

The shadow pokemon suddenly smirked to herself as she remembered the events that had occurred last night: she had punished the human for trying to escape, then she had put him inside her foot to prevent him trying to flee again.

And Gengar didn't know...

The purple ghost-type suddenly turned around, noticing Marshadow smirking to herself.

She approached the smaller pokemon.

"Gen?" she asked.

‘Where is the human?’
11332122112.title: A really dark night

114.content:
Trees pass in a blur around you. Your legs are screaming in agony with each stride, but you put it out of your mind. Focusing on the Pokemon Center on the edge of town is what is keeping you from giving way to the pain coursing through your body. Panting and drooling, you burst through the double doors of the Center and erratically make your way up to the desk where the Nurse looks concernedly at you.

"What ever happened to you??" Nurse Joy said excitedly.

"My pokemon and I...(wheeze) we we're (COUGH) we we're attacked.. outa no where by a crazy Scyther!"

"Oh my you're pokemon must be in critical condition! Nurse Chansey, I am going to aid these pokemon the best I can. You wait with this trainer and see if he needs anything."

"CHANsey!" exclaimed the pink pokemon.

The Chansey viciously grabbed your hand and pulled you towards the inn rooms stationed next to the pokemon Center.

"Wait! I-" you started. But Chansey yanked you so that you could not finish your plea. You followed her to the topmost room in silence. When she opened the door, the small room you entered had only room for a desk with a phone, a bed, and a rug. You were extremely worn out from running, so it was no surprise that when Chansey shoved you onto the bed you fell with little effort. You began to relax when suddenly the Chansey...
114.title: Chansey

1142.content:
You lie down with your eyes closed, expect the Chansey to leave you in peace. As roughly as she acted before, you didn't give any thought to it until you opened your eyes again to see her smiling face looking back at you. As you open your mouth to say something the Chansey begins to wave her small hands back and forth, seemingly chanting her name over you.

ChanSEY chan chanSEY...ChanSEY chan chanSEY...

You settle back down again. "Probably some healing move that Chanseys learn." You didn't know much about the pokemon. You begin to fall asleep. With the tension of your injured pokemon being healed off your mind you can relax. However, moments later something wakes you up quite quickly. You look down at yourself, then look around at the room, and see that you're SHRINKING! Now at about 1/3 your original size, you shoot up in bed to try and escape. It's only now that you notice that the Chansey has pulled up the guard on the bed that is normally used to keep injured patients from rolling out of bed. Now they are being used as a cage to keep you from getting out period. You stare up at the gigantic pokemon before you. With her Minimize attack complete, Chansey plants her eyes back on the now minuscule you. WIth astonishing grace, Chansey hops the guard and lands sitting on the bed. The impact of her landing rockets you up in the air. You then land, on your back, between her massive pink footsies.
1142.title: Shrink you

11421.content:
The strange part in all of this is that it seems as though this Chansey has done this before. I goes through the motions flawlessly and with such vigor you can only assume you aren't the first.

You wonder what could have possibly happened to the other who have been through the same recent circumstances as you. It seemed almost unbelievable that a pokemon KNOWN for its kindness and motherly instinct would have bring harm to another living thing.

These thoughts shoot through you head as you stare up at the Chansey's foot. It had stood up and was now slowly about to step on you. Maybe it was not it that was in slow motion, but rather your perception of time itself do to the incredible event occurring. Either way it did not matter as foot had just slammed down over you. You are partly crushed into the bed and partly pressed up into the Chansey's sole. The sole smelled like dirt and sweat, and everything that the pokemon had walked in that day.
11421.title: Chansey: Stomp you

114211.content:
In the utter darkness underneath the Chansey's foot, you survey your surroundings. You could barely make out the confines of your sweaty prison as half your face was sinking into the sole flesh of the foot above you. You practice opening your mouth and moving your arms and legs but the intense pressure of the foot pushing down on you limited your movement.

Suddenly, the foot above you began to move. Chansey started to roll you gently beneath her gargantuan foot. The feeling it gave her felt like a massage. Sure she was still using you as a tool for her relaxation, but at least you weren't being stomped on anymore. The worst part of the experience was being forced face-up to her worn soles. The smell almost became unbearable as her feet began to sweat by using you in such a way. After she had thoroughly rubbed down her one foot, she removed it from you only moments before crush you ith the opposite one. Then the foot massage process started all over again.

The Chansey was not parading around the bed, shouting her name and making extra sure to STOMP you with extra pressure each time she made a round. You watched her in amazement as she walked around to the top and then the foot of the bed, then came walking right on top you you. She did this several times; it almost seemed like a little victory dance to you. When she was done, she plopped down on the bed in from of you. You looked back up at her, wondering what she was going to do next.

She reached into her egg pouch and pulled out a length of twine...

She up off the bed and onto the ground. Was yo hit the ground you were forced into her sole even more.

123222.content:
So, is that Lopunny yours, or did you encounter it in the wild?

Your Lopunny is a nice and caring Pokemon. You trained with her since she was a Buneary. A hard road it way, but she eventually liked you enough to evolve. Now that you've obtained a Lopunnite, you can finally Mega Evolve her. However, Mega Lopunnies are well known for their aggressive tendencies. What will happen to your Lopunny when you Mega Evolve it?

A wild Lopunny you've encountered is well known among the local wildlife for her cruel streak. She beats all who dare enter her domain into submission, and turns them into helpless playthings with a combination of Minimize and Baton Pass. Her games have yet to have a happy ending for any of their unwilling participants.
Also, she's a shiny, 'cause why not~?
123222.title: Lopunny

choices: She remains gentle and kind, however much it was changed.
1232221.content:
As you think about your Lopunny, you suddenly remember that she loves to be out in the wild, with her trainer, as opposed to being in a Pokeball like most of her other kin when captured.

And so, you let out her with a simple click of the Pokeball’s button, as she immediately does a graceful spin-dance, before she then raises her hands in joy towards you. She was quite the high-spirited girl, wasn’t she?

As you plan to test out the newly-obtained Lopunnite that you have acquired, and integrated into your Mega Stone, you began to consider something, about what you said earlier.

Would it be a morally Just idea to risk altering Lopunny’s personality, by invoking her Mega Form, giving her the aggressiveness she has repressed, and possibly shattering her fitting personality of pure friendliness, innocence, kindness and generosity, just so that she could tap into the unknown potential she never knew she had? Even if it was merely a temporary change... The emotional and mental consequences that you and she would suffer are not light indeed.

After having to self-debate for so long, you decide that a trial must be done, for her and your sake. As a Trainer, you need power to maintain your relations with your held Pokemon, or they will eventually lose their trust in their Trainer as they grow more and more experienced. It’s either you take advantage of her trust that evolved her, to gain her true power, in order to solidify your rise to power, or risk losing her anyway, when the inevitable comes from so many random battles.

With a worried mind, you raise and activate the Mega Stone, as it speed forth the rainbow energy that unlocked the Mega Forms of so many Pokemon, as it enveloped Lopunny in a cyclone of prismatic flames, before it dissipated to reveal her new form.

Her long furred ears were now tied off into sections, as they themselves turned long and thin, with beige cuffs of fur between each section. The tufts of fur on her forepaws has been altered into cylinder-like squishy pseudo-gauntlets that covered her forearms. On her legs, you could see that there were black webbing over them, as they had several holes of varying size, much like torn stocking fabric, and her feet bore fur that were shaped like boots on the top, as there were rings of fur around the middle of her lower legs. The long eye-brows she had merged into a symmetrical butterfly at the centre of her forehead. What’s more, her figure changed from a endowed body to a more lithe one, to accent her change in biological focus,

No longer did you see a innocent angelic bunny-girl, who only fought battles with pity and kindness to her opponents, even as she held back as if she didn’t want to harm them seriously, and a held a aura of purity, innocence that made her adorable and cute to most Trainers. In her place was a more sharper and refined beauty, as her posture were more rigid and controlled, as her expression reflected little of her former pacifism and kindness, as they were replaced by feelings of loyalty, duty and respect, as well as her eyes radiating a stoic look, as if she has turned from a whimsical beauty to a refined female warrior who fought for the sake of respect and loyalty.

As the transformation ended, you prayed that her inner heart and mind would remain unchanged in this form. And the results were...
1232221.title: Mega Lopunny Time

choices: Stomps at yoiur body with her paws.
Slides her paw towards your face.
