Suddenly, while you were trying to figure out whether she has changed significantly or not, your Lopunny, in its Mega Form, surged forward with speed and power befitting her new transformation, as you only felt something impact your chin, before your world was turned upside-down in a mere spilt-second,

Stunned by the sudden attack, you remain still for a moment, before you raise your head slowly and shaking, to see that the Mega Lopunny was not happy at all, and judging from her posture, with one of her legs raised, it must have been the ball of her foot-paw that hit you from under your head.

Her eyes were filled with righteous scorn and anger, as she was moving herself closer to you step by step, as her footsteps were much stronger and heavier compared to her standard form.

And then the reason for what she did clicked. You’ve spent so long looking at her, with close eyes, that she has mistook it for ogling at her figure. Normally, Lopunny would only pour at such a lewd act, but she won’t hold it against you. Her Mega Form... Does that need explaining, after the recent events?

You try to get up, before you’re pinned down to the ground by her right foot-paw pressing your chest down. For once, you could see her eyes flare, as she is considering how to punish you. You can only hope that she’ll let up as quickly as possible.

She...
12322211.title: Her aggressiveness rears it head

choices: Follow her orders, and become her slave
Refuse, and see where tha gets you
Lopunny has a different idea, devious idea
1232222.content:
"Darn it! Blissey! Use Softboiled again!"

"B... Blissey!"

The pink Pokemon did as ordered, and used the move to heal herself... Only to have that effect mostly undone, as she was once again forced to tank another Jump Kick to the face from your opponent. You really didn't expect things to get so sour. Blissey was supposed to be this super annoying to deal with wall of a Pokemon, yet right now she was being toyed with by a freaking Lopunny. The wild, lop-eared Pokemon easily ran circles around her opponent, delivering one Jump Kick after another, while dodging Blissey's Hyper Beams and Focus Blasts with ease. Once she ran out of those moves, your Pokemon was forced to tank Lopunny with Softboiled, and hope she misses some of those Jump Kicks to knock herself out.

No such luck. Lopunny landed each and every single one of her moves. Now that she didn't have to run and dodge, she just stood still a short distance from you and Blissey, always waiting for her turn. This gave you an ample opportunity to notice a certain device she's been wearing: Wide Lens! So that's why she wasn't missing! How did she come across it? Gah, no matter. She had it, and you had to deal with it now. With that thing one, the Lopunny would always land her Jump Kicks, unless you lowered her accuracy somehow... Or if Blissey raised her evasion.

Here it was, the moment of truth. You ordered Blissey to heal again, but she wouldn't do it. She ran out of Softboiled. This was what Lopunny's been waiting for. Seeing her opponent unable to act, she immediately went for a finishing Jump Kick, not knowing you still had one trump card up you sleeve...

"Blissey! Use Minimize!"

At once, Blissey shrunk herself down, effortlessly dodging the Lopunny's attack. You watched as Lopunny flew over her target, and went on a crash course... With you?

Oh crap.

Unable to react to that, you could only watch as the Pokemon's paw went straight for your face. Closer and closer it came, its details becoming more intricate as it approached. You felt as if time itself slowed down to a crawl, just to let get a good look at her foot. It's three, plump toes, the sweaty pawpads that adorned their undersides, as well as the big one right in the middle of her sole. As it came even closer, you could also notice the dirt, and blades of grass that got stuck to it.

Ironically, the last thing you saw before the blow that knocked you out cold was Lopunny's own face. She was smiling.

---

When you finally regained consciousness, you could instantly that tell something was not right. You tried to move, get up, anything really, but you couldn't. Something was preventing you from moving. Your whole was bound by what appeared to be... Grass? Grass Knot, of course. Who could be responsible for this, though?

"Lop Lopunny~"

The lop-eared Pokemon dropped suddenly from above, having apparently spent the last who-knows-how-long sitting on top of a tree branch, waiting for you to wake up.

"Hey!" You yelled at the smug-looking Pokemon, who stood above you triumphantly "What's the big idea!? Release me right this instant, if you know what's good for you!"

The Lopunny merely giggled in response, amused by your empty bravado. You were in no position to make demands, yet here you were arguing with her as if you two were equal. How cute~
Still, it was slightly bothersome to have you so rebellious and spirited, when she had plans for you that required your complete subservience. Fortunately for her, Lopunny knew exactly how to bend you to her will...

The Pokemon reached for something she held stuffed in one of her 'ear fluffs', and presented it to you. You stopped fidgeting almost immediately as you noticed it, for in her hand Lopunny held another Pokemon. A familiar-looking, scared, pink blob...

Oh no. Since the battle wasn't technically finished yet, the effect of Minimize must've persisted all this time.

"Blissey!" you shouted out loud, enraged by the sight of your partner in peril. With what strength you could muster, you leapt forward at Lopunny, hoping you could knock her off balance. Sadly, it didn't come to be, as Lopunny swiftly moved aside, letting you fall flat on your face instead. You quickly resumed trying to break free from your bonds, but things only got worse, as your kidnapper called forth even more Grass Knots, tying you to the ground, with your face turned to the side, giving you a good view of your surroundings.

Carefully, Lopunny placed your Blissey a short distance from your face, and then used Grass Knot to prevent the egg-shaped Pokemon from running away. You couldn't believe just how small she was, like at most the size of your thumb. The two of you stared at one another for a bit, before looking up as something blotted out the light.

Lopunny towered above the two of you, looking proud and mighty. Though both of you lied at her feet, her focus was entirely on your Pokemon. Lopunny carefully rose her dainty paw in the air, poising it above Blissey's small form, and to your utter shock and terror, began its agonizingly slow descent.

It took Blissey a bit to get over the initial disbelief, but once she did, her panicked cries filled the silence around you. You didn't understand what she was saying, but you could tell that she was begging to be spared, pleading for her life. It didn't matter to Lopunny one bit, however, and she responded with a sinister giggle.

"Please, stop!" You yelled, joining Blissey's cries. The paw momentarily stopped in mid-air, the dominant Pokemon eyeing you in curiosity. Seeing how you failed to follow that up with anything, however, she resumed her deadly ploy. Now Blissey started screeching at you, seeing how your words had some effect on the cruel Pokemon.

"N-no! I beg you! Leave her alone! It's m-me you want, isn't it? I-I'll do anything, just please let her go!"

That seemed to do the trick. Just as her sole was about to press your scared Pokemon into dirt, it stopped. Lopunny left it hanging there for a bit, probably to give your terrified Blissey a good look at the pawpad that was about to become her final resting place. However, once she was done teasing your helpless Pokemon, she didn't set it aside. Instead, the cruel rabbit moved her paw towards your face.

You watched curiously, as she set her paw to hang in front of your nose, wiggling her toes around in a teasing manner. You wouldn't willingly nose breath with that thing around, but unfortunately Lopunny saw to it that you did, as once again she used Grass Knot to tie your mouth shut.

With no other option, you took a whiff of her paws, and instantly regretted it. They smelled as bad as they looked, reeked of dirt, trampled grass, and (of course) sweaty feet. Although there was some mysterious, sweet tinge to it that you couldn't quite explain. Maybe it came from some unlucky flowers that ended up beneath her stride.

Or some sweet-smelling Pokemon, you thought morbidly.

For a while you just stared at her outstretched paw, wondering what she was planning on doing, while cringing with every single fetid sniff she forced you to take. Suddenly, you heard Lopunny clear her throat, drawing your attention to her. Once you were looking at her, the rabbit Pokemon pointed at her paw, and made one, long, cruelly drawn out licking motion in the air. Then, with a snap of her finger, the Grass Knot over your mouth came off. You were free to breath again... And to follow her command.

Lick her foot clean. Slowly, and diligently. Debase yourself at her feet for your sake, as well as the sake of your Pokemon.

Can you do it?
1232222.title: A wild Lopunny attacks!

choices: The Lopunny orders you to move on to her toes
You feel the grass knots have slackened. Try to escape!
12322221.content:
You really, really don't want to do this. The foul scent of the Lopunny's fetid paws was still plaguing your nose, and the mere thought of putting your tongue anywhere near them was enough to make your stomach twist itself into a tight knot.

But, looking back down at your Blissey silently pleading with you, you realize you don't have a choice. You're not sure if the Lopunny would carry through her threat, but you're not about to risk it. Clenching your eyes shut, you hesitantly press your tongue outwards. It doesn't take long before it finds its target, quickly pushing into the warm and furry sole. You gingerly move it upwards, feeling the grime, dirt and fur caked to the underside rabbit pokémon's paw rub off against it as you complete your first lick.

While the texture of the foul mess you managed to collect is absolutely revolting, with the gunk sticking all over the inside of your mouth and the grit, fur and crushed blades of grass getting stuck between your teeth, you're surprised to find the taste, while still pretty bad, isn't quite as disgusting as you feared. It's mostly just salty, with the occasional hint of some fruit, berry or other thing unfortunate enough to be crushed beneath bipedal rabbit.

Knowing she won't let you go after just one lick, you lean in for a second go. And then a third. And a fourth. You quickly settle into a rhythm: First pressing your tongue hard against her heel, lapping upwards to collect whatever grime you can until you pass her main paw pad, then pulling the filth back into your mouth to scrape it off against your teeth and moving in for the next go.

Wanting to avoid focusing on the buildup of gunk in your mouth, you peek open an eye to see that the Lopunny's sat down at some point, eyes closed in relaxation as she enjoys your efforts, clearly content to have you serve her for as long as she pleases. At least the paw currently dominating your vision looks cleaner now, much of the dirt and grime clinging to it before having cemented itself in your mouth. The main pad has even started to turn bright pink once again, shining with your saliva as her plump toes happily wiggle above you, showering you with of their jam and dirt as they eagerly wait for their turn to enjoy your service.

Noticing your Blissey has gone oddly quiet, you twist your head around to check if she's still ok. To your relief, she doesn't look hurt but... there's clearly something wrong. She's acting odd, almost mesmerized as she intently stares at you slurping away at the rabbit pokémon's paw with a soft smile on her face and a clear blush on her cheeks. It takes a while before she notices you watching her, but this luckily seems to snap her out of her stupor, the small egg-shaped pokémon suddenly looking away from you in a panic as you see her blush grow a deeper crimson.

She's definitely acting weird It could be an effect of the prolonged minimize, or some sort of shell shock as she sees her trainer debase himself before another pokémon. In Any case, you don't really have any time to think about it as...
12322221.title: Follow her orders, and become her slave

choices: Lopunny did notice, and decided to punish Blissey
Lopunny didn't notice, and continues to torment you
Blissey offers to take your place, and clean Lopunny's other paw
123222211.content:
"Lop Lop~" you heard the rabbit Pokemon calling for your attention. Seeing how you didn't have much else to do at the moment, you reluctantly shifted your gaze back to the domineering Pokemon.

You immediately regretted that decision, as per her cruel shtick, Lopunny decided to ram her still filthy, unattended paw into your face, and clamp her grimy, foul-smelling toes around your nose. You tried to get around her malicious ploy by breathing with your mouth, but only ended up playing right into her paws. Without warning, Lopunny rose her other foot to your mouth, and stffed it with her plump, revolting toes.

This was pure nightmare. With your mouth shut by one of her filthy paws, you had not choice but to breath in the reeky scent of her toes. Its intensity was beyond compare, no doubt the worst smell you've ever had the displeasure of experiencing. Its pure, unfiltered foulness made you shiver in disgust, your eyes watering due to its sheer pervasiveness in your system. Breath in, cringe in revulsion, breath out. Over and over again.

Your tasting buds weren't faring much better. Through your watery eyes you were able to discern Lopunny doing a licking motion with her tongue, essentially ordering you to lick her toes clean. Just for clarity, she wiggled her putrid digits in tandem with the licking, leaving no room to misunderstand her body language. She wanted your tongue to get in there, and do some serious work. You had no guts nor will to refuse, not when she literally had you writhing at her feet, powerless to get out of this funky mess.

Damn, you couldn't even take a deep breath before 'digging in'. With what little strength you had, you started lapping at Lopunny's toes, mentally cursing every single decision that led to you this moment. You knew not how it was possible, but for some reason the grime on her toes tasted way worse that what you had to deal it when cleaning her main pad. It was much saltier, nowhere near as tolerable as it was, and its texture made it much less pleasant to just gulp down your throat like you did with her paw.

Licking all over her toes took you way longer than her cleaning her paw, if only because you felt much more tired. However, even after all this damned effort, you were still not done with the task. Just as you thought it was finally over, Lopunny let out a devilish giggle as she spread her toes as wide as she could, leaving you with two, putrid toe crevices to work on.

This was it, the 'final boss' of your torment. The fetid mesh that Lopunny carelessly allowed to fester in-between her plump digits. The residue of all that she ever stepped on, crushed, and squashed could be found there, dating who knows how far back. Even things that shouldn't taste bad, like remnants of fruits and berries, were already way past their prime, and rotted into more gunk and toe jam.

'Cleverly' enough, you actually took a deep, long breath before getting on with your job, just to split your attention between those two vastly different, but equally overwhelming sources of disgust. It did the trick well enough, and you were able to get through this phase without pausing too much... Even if each passing moment made you feel as if you were standing at death's doorstep.

It took a bit, a dreadfully inflated bit in your opinion, but Lopunny eventually dragged her legs back to see how well you did, leaving you to your own devices. You were still tightly bound by her Grass Knot, but just being able to take a deep breath of clean air was enough to bright tears of joy to a broken man like you.

All of a sudden, you started feeling much, much better. The aftertaste of Lopunny's foot grime left your mouth completely, as did the memories of her putrid odour. You began to look for the source of this great, refreshing feeling, and once you did finally locate it, it moved you to tears.
Your dear Blissey has managed to break her grassy bonds. However, instead of running away from Lopunny, she made her way towards your still immobilized form, and once close enough started throwing Heal Pulse after Heal Pulse at you, hoping that it would make you feel any better. It did, and you couldn't think of proper words to describe how thankful you were, not that you even had to. You already did so much for her sake, demeaning yourself before this rabbit just so she wouldn't suffer instead. She had to help you make it through this nightmare somehow, even if it meant risking her own well-being.

This beautiful moment sadly had to be cut short, as Lopunny was done checking out her freshly cleaned paw, and was now ready to make you give her other paw a similar treatment. Blissey rushed back to her spot, and clumsily covered herself with some grass blades, hoping her giant tormentor wouldn't notice that she freed herself from their grasp...
123222211.title: The Lopunny orders you to move on to her toes

choices: Uh-oh, looks like you missed a spot.
1232222112.content:
Blissey was trembling like a leaf, eyes clenched tightly shut in fear as she tried to avoid the giant rabbit's notice. She didn't have anything to worry about, Lopunny had been way to preoccupied inspecting your work. The pokémon turned her foot this way and that, even jamming a finger deep in between the crevices of her fuzzy toes to check for any leftover gunk. Not able to find any, she raises the foot into the air with a deceptively innocent giggle, flexing and wiggling the plump digits to simply enjoy the feeling of having them move, unburdened for the first time in god knows how long by the impressive amount of grime and filth they had collected over the years.

Your reprieve didn't last for long as she was quickly pulled out of her little game by noticing you were still bound helplessly before her. She slowly lowered her paw back down as she extended its sibling in front of your face. Once again your view was dominated by the rabbit's disgusting sole. It looked like a war zone, with the crushed remains of countless things stuck fast to the vast expanse of the Lopunny's paw, pulped beyond recognition underneath the pokémon's powerful stride and glued in place by the foul cement-like mixture of dirt, grime and her sweat.

Not content by just having you gaze at her foot, the Lopunny tries to your attention by clenching her toes. You're snapped out of your daze as you hear the thick digits squeeze together with an audible squelch, forcing some of the long built up gunk out from between them. Looking back up at the pokémon, you're given your next order as she casually opens her mouth with a soft "Looo~".

Knowing what will follow, but realizing you have no choice, you obey. Slowly, hesitantly, you open up your own mouth, offering it as a home for the fetid toes alread wriggling in anticipation in front of it. You've already managed to polish off one paw, the other can't be worse, right?

You realize you made a mistake as soon as the sadistic bunny shoves her furry digits inside. The dirt you licked off from her sole had shielded you from the worst taste of her toes earlier. While your Blissey's heal bell had revitalized you enough to take on the second foot in the first place, it had also removed all the the grime left coating your mouth, leaving it once again clean and pristine.

Ready to be befouled all over again by the Lopunny's fetid paws.

An ice cold shiver ran over your back the second your tongue brushed against the underside of one of the rabbit's toes. Any hope for some respite was dashed as the invading digits mercilessly advanced deeper inside. Tears start to well up in your eyes again at the foulness your experiencing, soon breaking into a heavy coughing fit as you feel one of her claws poke against the back of your throat. In the midst of your suffering, you realize your tongue had somehow found its way between two of the bunny's foul little piggies, finding salty, crusty fur and simi-solid sludge wherever it turns. Your feel your stomach spasm in protest against it all, and are barely able to avoid bringing the previous load of filth back up.

The Lopunny, meanwhile, gleefully watches you choke on her foot. The way you wriggle and writhe against your bonds like a worm, the soft sobs you make as you try to regain control of your body's violent protest against her foul feet, and the fact she can immediately render your best efforts futile with a mere flex of her tootsies has completely enraptured her, and she continues to toy with you like this for a good while longer.

Eventually though, you manage to fight off your body's instinctual reaction. The struggle has completely tired you out, and you've yet to even start actually cleaning the paw. Pathetically, but desperate to end your torment, you start to suckle on one of her toes. After matting down her fur with a fresh coating of your saliva, you use your tongue to massage the pad underneath, enticing the filth that has been caked to it to take up residence in your mouth. Then, dreading the next part, your force your tongue in between the toe and its neighbor, using it to forcefully excavate glob after glow of unnameable foul sludge. You feel your body shudder with every mouthful you force down your throat, the disgusting mess sitting heavily in your stomach.

You suddenly feel the pokemon's paw push against your dazed face, wiping itself up and down. It seems your tormentress wants you to finish your job. Taking your cue, you start obediently lapping away at her sole. As a small mercy, it seems the foulness of her toe-gunk has robbed your tongue of the ability to taste anything for a while. When you feel like you're probably smearing more grime back onto her foot than your licking is removing you decide to stop, not resisting as you see her paw slowly fall down on top of you. You can feel her toes happily thrumming on your head as she uses your face as an impromptu footrest.

Soon, you feel the furry expanse lift from your face as the rabbit inspects your work.
1232222112.title: Lopunny didn't notice, and continues to tor...

12323331.content:
So is this Mienfoo your own or a wild one.

Your Mienfoo was your very first Pokémon you ever obtained, having hatched her at the dojo you attend as a Fighting Type Trainer. Thus the two of you share an extremely close knit bond the Mienfoo always being by your side outside of her Pokéball, training and eating with each and even sharing in some...strange mutual interest with each other. What kind of interesting hijinks will you two get up to.

Meanwhile, this Wild Mienfoo has been a complete menace to both the people and Pokémon near the area she has made its home. The Powerful Mienfoo is known for dominating both people and Pokémon who get too close to her abode with her feet before knocking them out and taking whatever finds her fancy from them. She has become so infamous that the nearby town has put up a large reward for anyone who can either make the Mienfoo leave the area or capture her. You are one of the many trainers hoping to take the Mienfoo down.
12323331.title: Mienfoo Line

choices: Start giving your Mienfoo’s Feet the attention they deserve
You suddenly hear something rustling from the bushes.
123233311.content:
You were heading towards the next town with a pep in your step with Mienfoo happily walking right beside you humming happily. As a Fighting Type Trainer you were always barefoot and both you and Mienfoo loved the feeling of the dirt and grass underneath your feet. As you two continued walking you notice that the sun was beginning to set. Seemed like you’d been traveling for a lot longer then you intentionally realized. Well there was the eating and the few battles you did on the way.

“Hey Mienfoo, how about we get some rest for now? It’ll be nice to relax and get some shut eye since we still have a ways to go.”

Foo! The Martial Artist Pokémon responded, clearly agreeing with your suggestion.

It took a while but by the time it had gotten dark, you managed to make a campfire as you and Mienfoo sat around the Campfire. You let out a yawn as you laid on the grass and closed your eyes.

Foooooo... You suddenly felt a familiar soft and furry footpaw tapping on your cheek as you opened one eye to see your Mienfoo prodding at you with her somewhat dirty feet as a smile spread on your face. You did promise Mienfoo that you’d give a good little worship session after she won that battle against that Psychic and his Pokémon. And it looks like it was about time to pay up.
123233311.title: Your Mienfoo

choices: Somehow, Nuzleaf manages to pull out a victory and cause Mienfoo to faint!
123233312.content:
“Monferno!!!” You could do nothing as you watched the wild Mienfoo deliver a powerful Hi Jump Kick to the Monkey’s gut causing him to fly into the air before landing back on Terra Firma with a loud thud knocked out. “Crap, Monferno return!”

You returned your Monferno to his Pokéball as you wondered how it’d had gotten this bad. You thought something like this could possibly be easy but now you knew why the reward to deal with this wild Mienfoo was so high, it was incredibly powerful. In a manner of a seconds it had knocked out your Grumpig, Aromatisse and your Monferno with ease without breaking a sweat. Throughout the entire fight the Mienfoo had the same cocky expression on its face, almost as if this was nothing but a game for her.

You grabbed the last Pokéball in your hand unable to hide the fear in your shaking hand. The only Pokémon you had left was Nuzleaf and he was already at a disadvantage due to his typing. If Mienfoo easily took down both Grumpig and Aromatisse who it had a disadvantage against, then Nuzleaf stood no chance. But you had no choice. You knew the Mienfoo wouldn’t simply let you run away. She’d just hunt you down considering the stories. You had to put all your faith in Nuzleaf.

“Alright. Go Nuzleaf!!!” Your Nuzleaf was released from its Pokéball, instantly getting into a fighting stance. The Mienfoo giggled, knowing that this was your last resort. You gulped, it all came down to this. You had to find some way to turn this all around or...you didn’t even want to think of what would happen if you’d lose.
123233312.title: A Wild Mienfoo appears!

choices: Capture the Mienfoo and bring her back to the town.
Start Worshiping the Mienfoo’s feet while she’s unconscious.
1232333121.content:
Without a second thought the Mienfoo rushed towards your Nuzleaf, ready to finish off the fight with another single High Jump Kick. You only had about two seconds to give your Nuzleaf a command.

“U-Use Fake Out!!!”

“Nuz!” Nuzleaf clapped his hands together, creating a Shockwave which pushed the Mienfoo back.

“Foo!?!” The Mienfoo seemed surprised by the sudden shockwave but gracefully landed back on her feet. After recovering, Mienfoo rushed towards Nuzleaf again, this time ready to finish the fight. But luckily, that Fake Out gave you even more time to think on what to do and you remembered that Nuzleaf has a move that could turn this thing around. Everything relied on this move, it was all or nothing.

“Nuzleaf use Foul Play!” Nuzleaf nodded as he rushed towards Mienfoo, as a dark energy surrounded his closed fist. The Mienfoo didn’t seem to be concerned as it quickly closed the gap between her and her opponent. She rose her knee as it started to glow and delivered the decisive strike to Nuzleaf’s gut. Or so she thought.

“Mieeeen...Mieeeeen...Foo!!!!” The Mienfoo suddenly cried out in pain as Nuzleaf’s fist managed to land right into her side. Foul Play was a move that used the strength of its opponent against them and with how strong this Mienfoo was there was no doubt that this Foul Play would be extremely powerful. Both Pokémon were sent flying off from the powerful exchange with both of them landing on the ground. You looked at your Nuzleaf who was quite unconscious from the Mienfoo’s attack which wasn’t surprising at all.

“You did great Nuzleaf. You deserve a good rest.” You returned Nuzleaf to it’s Pokéball as you walked up to the wild Mienfoo who was currently laying in her stomach on the grass.

The Mienfoo to your relief, was clearly unconscious seemingly not being able to take what she could dish out. You could see the white of her eyes as drool pooled out of her mouth. She panted heavily as her small body twitched around every so often. If there was anytime to go and claim your prize for defeating this local menace it was now. You could easily capture her and go back to the town. But the Mienfoo’s larger then normal feet did seem to be quite sexy even with all the sweat, dirt and grass stuck to them. A part of you really wanted to know how they tasted. And plus, wouldn’t this be the ultimate karma for a Pokémon who constantly dominated others with her footpaws, to have her own be used for the pleasure of someone else?
1232333121.title: Somehow, Nuzleaf manages to pull out a victory ...

choices: Give in to the Mienfoo and become her Foot Slave.
Refuse and see what ends up happening.
1232333122.content:
Without a second thought the Mienfoo rushed towards your Nuzleaf, ready to finish off the fight with another single High Jump Kick. You only had about two seconds to give your Nuzleaf a command.

And you didn’t have time to even make a sound before the Mienfoo’s kneed your Nuzleaf right in the gut.

“Nuuuuuuz...” Nuzleaf’s eyes rolled into his sockets as he collapsed onto the ground at his opponent’s feet. Your heart started to race as you fumbled around to get Nuzleaf back into his Pokeball. Just as you managed to grab ahold of it, you looked back up and saw the Mienfoo’s large dirty and sweaty feet aimed straight at your face.

———————

“Nngh...uggggh...” After sometime, you finally regained consciousness as you groggily tried to get a sense of your surroundings. You seemed to be leaning up against a rocky wall as you quickly realized that you were in a cave of some kind. You tried to move but quickly realized that you were paralyzed from the neck down. Most likely from the result of Mienfoo using Force Palm on you. You also quickly realized that not only was your bag and other items nowhere to be found, but more worryingly that you didn’t seem to have any of your Pokémon on you.

“Mieeeen?” You fully snapped back to your senses when you heard that familiar playful voice. The Mienfoo seemed to have appeared out of nowhere as stood in front of you with a smile on her face. Her hands were behind her back as she rose her left foot and tried to force her toes into your mouth. Luckily, since you at the very least had control of your mouth you refused to open it for the devilish little Pokémon. The Mienfoo let out an annoyed growl but quickly regained her sly smile. She finally revealed what she was holding, dropping the your team’s empty Pokéballs right in front of you. Your heart instantly sank as your mind quickly began to assume the worst.

“What happened to my team! What did you do to them!?!”

“Mieeeeeen...” The Mienfoo just giggled as she disappeared back into the darkness before returning with a Cheri Berry in her hands. She popped into your mouth as you gulped the spicy berry down, as you quickly regained control of your body. “Mien! Mienfoo!” With a bit more force in her voice the Mienfoo beckoned to you, clearly telling you to follow her. Completely worried about your Pokémon partners you followed her without a word. After a bit of walking you made it to another room in the cavern where you saw your Monferno, Nuzleaf, Grumpig and Aromatisse all unconscious propped up against a wall like you were just a few moments ago. You tried to rush towards your Pokémon but the Mienfoo punched you in the knees, sending you crumpling to the ground

“Mien.” The Mienfoo unsheathed one of its claw and tapped your nose, clearly showing who was the one in control right now. Her devilish little smile quickly returned as she strutted towards your Pokémon as she started to point out a very specific trend with your team. You’ve always liked to catch Pokémon with different feet from the rest of their species, whether it be that they’re just larger and wider like Monferno’s, being much meatier and pudgier like Nuzleaf’s and Aromatisse, or even being completely and utterly different like your Grumpig’s human-like three-toed feet. You tried to not look the Mienfoo in the eye, ashamed that it had found out about your foot fetish.

“Mieeeeeeen!” You once again felt the Mienfoo’s dirty and sweaty toes prodding at your lips. Looking up at her the Mienfoo pointed to your team before once again unsheathing one of her claws and making a slicing motion across her neck. Your heart skipped a beat as you quickly understood that this was Mienfoo’s ultimatum. Become her little footslave or your Pokémon would be the ones to face the consequences.

You had almost immediately opened your mouth to let her foot in before you remembered something. In all the reports of this Mienfoo’s attacks it has never said anything about her killing those that she attacked. At worst they may have gone missing for two or three days but nothing as severe as this. This could easily just be a ploy to try and get you to worship her feet and you could quite easily call her bluff. But did you really want to risk it?
1232333122.title: Mienfoo easily defeats your Nuzleaf

1311.content:
We could go with Oddish, we could!

But why, when there are so many other 3 Evo choices. Your choice?
1311.title: Oddish

13112.content:
That's more like it.

So, which line will you go with?
13112.title: Another 3 Evo line

131121.content: Which one of the three will go with?
131121.title: Fennekin line

1311213.content:
You knew your Delphox since the day she was a Fennekin. Even back then she had a certain... opinion of you, one she held onto over the course of many, many years you two spent fighting together.
Right now, as you sat opposite of her at a campfire, you could look into her eyes, and tell exactly what she was thinking of you... The same thing she always thoughts of you.

Your bond was based on:

Option 1: Friendship
You and Delphox were close friends, and the two of you would do everything for the other if it made them happy.

Option 2: Domination
Delphox loved being on top of things, with you at the bottom. She was you queen, your goddess, and you would treat her as such, unless you want her to 'punish' you.

Option 3: Hate
Delphox hated you, hated serving you, hated having anything to do with you. She desired to be free, and to make you her slave... or crush you like a bug if you refused.

So, which one it will be?
1311213.title: Delphox

choices: You to lick my feet clean.
13112132.content:
Damn it. There was that look again. The one she always gave you shortly before throwing you down at her paws, to have her way with you.

"Please, Del. I'm tired. Let's save this for tomorrow."

She let out a light chuckle in response. Sorry, you're not getting out of this one.

As she approached, Delphox spoke right into your mind. Just for show, she went right thought the middle of the campfire, the fire doing her no harm at all. In fact, it tickled a little, the Pokemon laughing heartily as the flames 'licked' at her paws. Soon she would have something, or rather someone else lapping at them...

As she came out of the flames, Delphox's body gave of an intimidating, scarlet glow. She loved to instill fear in you like this, it made her feel more powerful, more imposing.
You, of course, weren't going to just give in to her wants without a fight, even though your attempts at resisting were laughably ineffectual. You were basically going through the motions at this point. You would reach for her Poke Ball, and she would use Psychic to pin you to the ground. Then she would slowly walk overly, deliberately making her steps sound as crunchy as possible.


Mmmmm~ She cooed into your mind. What a wonderful spot you chose to rest, my loyal servant. The ground here is so crunchy. As I walk, I can feel so many, many things ceasing to exist right underneath my pretty pawpads. A dried leaf here, a fallen twig there, some feeble stones in between, and to top them all...

CRUNCH

A nice, big, juicy buuug~, she finished,grinding her paw left and right into dirt, all the while keeping your head turned to its, so you could see this whole 'spectacle' unfold.
Delphox loved getting her feet all messy. After all, it was your job to keep them clean. She would go on long walks, getting her paws all sweaty, just to have you lick them clean afterward. She would also ruin your meals by squashing them underpaw, and then make you eat them straight from her soles and toes, 'enriched' by whatever else she had clinging to those feet. Well, you couldn't really hold that one against her. Del was , after all, the one making said meals in the first place.

Some nights, however, she had enough of this 'child's play', as she called it. No, those nights she wasn't simply your mistress, but your goddess. A radiant being not of this world, who chose to grace your pathetic self with her presence, and make you her chosen servant. Of course, she had to first get herself in the role of an all-powerful being, and what better way to do it than snuffing literal lives underfoot?
Well, bugs made for a poor 'groveling' public, but that's also what she had you for.

Delphox pointed at something on the ground with a glowing finger. You worryingly followed it with your eyes, and eventually found what she was looking at: a slug. A big, juicy mollusk, slowly making its way through the ground. You looked back at Del, and this time her finger was pointed at you. The yellow spark at the tip of her finger shined brightly, and before you knew it, everything went dark.

---

When you opened your eyes, you weren't a human anymore. You were a slug, the same one that's been slithered its way so close to you just a couple moments ago. In fact, as you looked around, you found your body, motionless. Still. Dead?

THOOM

A giant paw fell down close to you, to the slug. Too close for comfort. You tried to move, to get away, but you couldn't. Your mind was stuck, tied to that slimy thing's body. Del did this on purpose, to torture you even more. Speaking of which...

She was enormous, a true image of a powerful goddess. She smiled brightly at you, but there was nothing pleasant in that smile. Del was like a kaiju now, ready to smush you out of existence with a single step if she wanted to. And boy, did she want to.

If you had a jaw, it would break through the floor, and fall into the basement. For someone so impossibly gigantic, she moved so swiftly, so elegantly. With little effort she rose her paw above you, giving you a clear view of her dirty foot. Dirt and some bug guts rained all around you, as the giant Pokemon waved her paw around, enjoying the anticipation of the squish she was about to deliver. Her toes wiggled in delight, ready to smash your slug body into mush in-between them.

FE! FI! FO! FUM! Her voice boomed all around you, instilling dread and hopelessness. What is this little creature that dares ruin my day with its disgusting presence? The world ill needs such a worthless thing. To get rid of you would be doing the rest of us all a great service. Now, die under my foot, little felon. Die as you lived, writhing beneath the feet of your betters.

She did as she said. Her foot fell down slowly, agonizingly so, with the main pawpad aimed right at 'your' slug's pathetic body. You screamed internally as it approached, unable to take your eyes away from the apocalyptic sight. You would die here like some nameless bug, thoroughly rubbed into the filth staining the bottoms of Del's feet, and forgotten by all...

Even when it finally came, your torture was far from over. The giantess was methodical in her extermination, at first only rubbing your squishy, soft body underneath her paw, before gradually applying more and more pressure. The pawpad was naturally pretty soft, but to something so small and insignificant as you, it was harsh and unyielding. It pressed on more and more, the pain getting worse with each passing second. You screamed into her foot, pleading for mercy and release from this torment, but Del wouldn't hear you. After all, this was exactly what she wanted.
One final press of her paw, and everything went black again.

---

When you opened your eyes, you were back in your body, staring unwilingy as Del twisted her foot left and right ontop of the spot that slug (you) was just a second ago. Of course, now that the deed was done, memories came flooding back. It wasn't the first time she did something like this, trapping your mind in a body of some insect she was about to crush. She would always block some of your memories while doing so, to make sure the experience was always as fresh and terrifying as possible. She was goddess, but also a demoness incarnate.

For some reason, tears began streaming down your face, as some of the slug's remains began to seep out from underneath Del's unrelenting paw. Once she was well and truly finished with it she dragged her foot back with a 'satisfying' squelch, and then revealed its disgusting sole for your 'viewing pleasure'. She crushed that slug real good, its 'essence' spread evenly across the enite bottom of her paw, making it even more repulsive to look at... And the prospect of what was to come even less enticing.

Now, she 'said', putting her foot down with one last squish, With the foreplay done, we can finally move onto some truly titillating stuff. Hmm, I think I want...
13112132.title: Domination

1312.content:
Phew... that was rough. You were in a forest training your Totodile, but he wasn't coping very well with the Pokemon in the area. Having nearly fainted after an attack from a quite vicious Parasect and you were rushing him through the forest to the nearest Pokemon Center.

But you were pretty sure this wasn't the right way.

The forest grew darker and thicker. You would really need to get out of here fast, as night was nearly falling. This was definitely not the ideal situation to be in. And you could hear Pokemon rustling in the bushes...

Suddenly, a massive group of Pokemon jumped out at you, several Oddish, Caterpie, and a few Bulbasaur. Generally these weak Pokemon wouldn't be an issue, but Totodile had no energy left to battle so you had to try your best to fight them off, which failed. The Caterpie and Bulbasaur worked together using String Shot and Vine Whip to bind you and Smeargle and the Oddish carried you off into the forest...

In this dark part of the forest, there was a clearing where a throne-shaped tree root stood. Sitting on this was a Gloom, wearing what appeared to be a crown made of vines and a large brown leaf in the center. The Oddish threw you on the ground and carried Totodile away. The queen Gloom slowly approached you, in your helpless cocoon state. She smiled and raised her left foot, indicating towards it. It was obvious what she wanted.
1312.title: A Walk in the Forest

13121.content:
Not wanting to anger the queen Gloom, you raise your head so your nose meets the Gloom's foot and take a deep sniff.

Now you realize why they get their reputation. Gloom are naturally known to excrete a horrible smelling nectar, but... The queen Gloom's foot smelled incredibly stinky. It smelled of moldy cheese and vinegar, to be precise. This pungent aroma nearly made you throw up, and the Gloom was particularly proud of this fact. But you had much more torture in store.

The Gloom made you smell her left foot for the next ten minutes, and then she switched it with her right. Her right foot smelled even worse and at this point you were close to fainting. You couldn't take much more of this and the thought of how you were ever going to escape from this. You were wondering what had happened to Totodile and was wondering whether he was going through the same sort of smelly hell somewhere else.

After another ten minutes the Gloom removed her right foot and you had about twenty seconds of fresh air. But, the Gloom sat back on her throne, and the Oddish carried you closer...
13121.title: Gloom: Foot Smelling

'What the hell does he meant by games' Buny quickly thinks as she dumbfounded at what he said to them. The lithe and tall ralts and plump and plucky happiny simply sat down.The former doing it in defiance,and the latter doing it to figure out a game to appease the trainer

Buny took a good look at Rally. She was quite...alluring for a Ralts. Her lithe and slim figure were attractive,and hold great potential. Her face...were child like,and looked soft and sweet. And finally her feet were an very impressive size.

'She certainly is impressive. Not as much yours truly.' Buny thought about the cute ralts with a subtle but steadily growing blush. But she remembered the humiliation she faced because of the both of them.

'I'm so sorry Rally...but I have ruined that sweet face of yours. ' Buny thought with vengeance,her wide and thick paws wriggled in Glee as they prepared themselves for a...game. Buny licked her lips as she suddenly launched in the air. She was falling towards the ralts,and she was not the wiser.

But does the bratty Buneary's plan work out?
132112221.title: Team-building exercises.

choices: She didn't, and starts tormenting Jaime now that he's vulnerable
Rally interrupts, she's got a bone to pick with Jaime as well
132112222.content:
"Alright, that's enough of that.". Jaime claps his hands, getting his three little darlings to focus back on him. The Buneary slowly tumbles onto her belly, losing her balance by the interruption as she was about to pounce on Ralts.

Jaime crouches down in front of your pokémon, gently scolding them for their antics. "You're all part of the same team now, so you'll have to learn how to get along, alright?".

While Happy looked embarrassed and even Rally quieted down without a fuss, Jaime's newest addition defiantly crossed her arms, pointedly looking away from him with a huff. He had to suppress a smile at the little drama queen's theater, unable to resist poking a bit more at the bratty pokémon's ego.

"Now, now Buny, let's come to an agreement. Tell you what, how about I let you vent your frustration out on me? But I'll expect you to behave like a good little bunny afterwards"

The Buneary's face scrunched into an angry scowl at hearing her nickname again. Jaime didn't have to wait long for her reply, one of hear ears quickly shooting out as she tried to deck him in the face. Luckily he'd expected it, quickly standing up to put himself out of reach of the attack. He also quickly motioned to Happy to stay out of it, the loyal pokémon already wanting to rush forward to help her trainer. Jaime managed to keep this up for a while, the Buneary becoming more and more flustered as she's unable to land even a single strike.

Eventually though, when moving out of the way of yet another blow, Jaime felt his heel catch on a root. He manages to avoid tripping, but regaining his balance put him right in the path of Buny's next kick. It hit him square in the chest, knocking him on his back. The Buneary wasn't expecting to land the attack, and was sent tumbling down with him. She landed on top of Jaime's upper body, forcing a grunt our of him as he cushioned her fall.

The kick definitely stung against the trainers chest, and the fall had knocked the wind out of him, but he still looked in better shape than the rabbit pokemon standing on top of him. Seeing the haughty bunny flustered, sweaty and panting heavily from the effort, Jaime couldn't stop himself from letting out a laugh.

"Well, looks like you got me! Feeling any better?"

choices: Jaime gently grab her feet,and slowly brings them to his face..

Buny's scowl worsened at the sight of her foul trainer's smug smirk.She was just about to wipe it off,and forcibly teach him the error of his ways!

But to both the trainer and rabbit's surprise.Rally stomps towards the fallen trainer. She made the stunned buneary gently float to the frightful happiny.

Rally then turn to Jaime with a mean frown. She greatly struggle as she removed both his buttoned up shirt and the t-shirt thus revealing his pale skinned torso.Jaime simply a had bored look on his face

The pokemons' faces all gained a blush at the sight.Rally floated the clothes to Happy, which she easily caught.

The taller than normal ralts gently but firmly put her big and very human like feet on the boy's stomach.Her five long toes were unwittingly tickling his belly…but he won't let the ralts hear him laugh.

She began to rapidly stomp on his torso.But despite her angry face,her light stomps told him that she doesn't want to truly hurt and injured him. She could never live with herself if she does that.All she wants is for Jaime to stop being such a smug bully!

Buny is snickering like a madman,as she hold down a tearful Happy.

What will happen next?

A deep crimson blush appears on her cheeks as she gingerly extends her foot
Happy and Buny interrupt, wanting a piece of the action as well
13211222221.content:
"Or did you hurt your little feetsies, stomping all over me like that?" The cheeky trainer's grin made her pause her "punishment". Jaime happily made use of the psychic type's confusion, laughing as he quickly grabbed hold of her ankles and pulled them towards him. Rally lost her balance, falling down butt-first on the big bully with a shrill yelp.

"Just relax and let your trainer kiss 'em better, little Rally. They'll feel good as new in no time" the human teased. The confused psychic type's otherwise pristinely white head quickly changed into the most adorable shade of pink as she felt the boys lips land on the ball of her foot. Even Buny and Happy stop fighting as they see you plant a big smooch on Rally's sole.

Jamie released his pokémon, causing her to quickly scoot backwards. Once she was out of reach, she stood up again on top of you. 13212.content:
"Come out Happs and Rally" Jaime said while sending out his happiny and newly nicknamed ralts.

Happs fearfully stared at her trainer and awaited for his next command. While Rally was on guard,because the energy that come from this..."boy" was the complete and polar opposite to the positve amd hopeful rookies she commonly seen walk down and played in the flower gardens.

"Happs,play with your new teammate" their trainer commanded in a dead but lustful and gleeful tone that disgusted the ralts.
