13212.title: The demented boy's amusement..

1323.content:
You caught yourself a Ralts along your pokemon journey.

But the Ralts you caught has an awfully sadistic sort of personality.

It enjoys using its powerful psychic attacks to mangle its enemies completely. And sometime, even, turn them on you.

Now in your journey, that Ralts has fully evolved into a Gardevoir, making her all the more deadly.

Which brings us to today, where your Gardevoir decides to pop out of her pokeball and have some fun with you out of boredom.
1323.title: Gardevoir

choices: Gardevoir hypnotizes passing female pokemon to come dom!
13231.content:
It was in the middle of the forest when it happened. I was trotting along the path, peacefully and quietly, when I heard the all too familiar sound of a pokemon being released from it's ball. I was alone, and only had one pokemon, so I knew what that meant; Gardevoir let herself out. Again. I was relatively used to this happening, as it wasn't exactly uncommon.

I fumbled for my pokeball, in an attempt to quickly return her, but I was much too slow and clumsy! Within seconds of her seeing my struggle, she pinned me to the ground with psychic. I couldn't move or speak, all I could do was wait as she used her powers to levitate me, and bring me with her off the path and into the forest...

Once were a suitable distance away from the path, Gardevoir used her powers to wrap me up tight with strong vines! I saw the lustful look on her face; it was time for her to have fun with me! She started by plopping down onto my stomach with her smelly rear-end. She planted both of her raunchy, cheese reeking feet on either side of my head, and looked down at me devilishly...
13231.title: Location: Forest

13232.content:
You had just checked into this pokemon center/inn this morning. You lie on the bed taking it easy after beating out some local trainers in pokemon battles.

Your bag is on top of the dresser, with all your items and pokemon inside of it. A red light emanates from the bag and your Gardevoir releases herself from the spherical prison. She sits, legs crossed, on top of the dresser with the worst kind of smile on her face. Seeing her there, you clap your hands on your face, anticipating what was next. Her eyes narrow and her smile widens. Your arms whip down to your sides and your legs smack together, as if some invisible binding had coiled around you.

Gardevoir got down and began to walk over to the bed...
13232.title: Location: Inn

choices: Gardevoir: Make you smell both feet
132321.content:
Gardevoir hoisted her self onto the bed and sat on your stomach. She pushed her dress back and placed her long, slender, white legs on either side of your head. You managed to glance one more time at her sadistic grin before she shoved one of her feet in your face.

She stomped down hard, and rub vigorously with her left foot. She'd knock your head around and slap it lightly with her foot. You could hear her giggle quietly as she forced your head around face-first into her sole. It didn't smell good. It was a pale odor, similar to moldy socks.
132321.title: Gardevoir: Sit on you

choices: She decides to do something else to you
1323211.content:
You tried to turn your head away from her foot, but to no avail. She takes her foot off of your face and glares at you in a stern manner. It is obvious that if you do not obey her commands, there will be severe consequences. Not wanting to be on her bad side, you turn your face towards her overwhelming stature, and gently tilt your head back so your nostrils are facing her. By now, you know her desires, and it is time that you have to face her most smelliest.

She realises that you are powerless against her orders, so she returns to her state of arousal. The thrill of dominating you and making you suffer her pleasant odors made her feel very excited. In this rush of excitement, she shovels her toe into your nostril, demanding you to smell it. As you have no other option, you take a big whiff at it. Her toes had a familiar scent of vinegar, which at first smelt gruesome, but after some time became pleasant.
1323211.title: Gardevoir: Make you smell both feet

choices: Gardevoir: LIck her feet clean, from toes to heel!
13232111.content: After a few minutes of being trapped under your Gardevoir, her feet planted on your face, you began to enjoy the pungent smell of her feet. Playfully, Gardevoir opened her toes and clamped your nose between them. Got your nose. A telepathic thought sent to you. Your mind was racing with lust as you inhale the strong odor between your Pokemon's toes. Gardevoir giggles slightly and sends another thought. You know, I know what you would enjoy. I need not ask; she could read your mind. Gardevoir stood up and, using a combination of Guard Swap and Minimize, shrunk you. You kept shrinking as Gardevoir kept using Minimize then transferring it to you. After about five shrink-filled minutes, you were the size of an ant and Gardevoir's large feet stood before you. She moved her foot, which was twice your height, in front of your face and splayed her toes. The scent that emerged drove you crazy; it was the familiar vinegary smell, but amplified one hundred fold! You ran forward and drove your nose in between her bus-sized toes. You vigorously sniffed, and even threw in a few licks, as you worshiped your Gardevoir's massive feet. Gardevoir giggled yet again and sent one more thought to you. Now that you are my foot-bug, let's do something to fit your new size.
13232111.title: Gardevoir's Foot-Bug

choices: You're able to lick her foot clean
You fail, and are punished for it
As you climb her foot, another Pokemon joins Gardevoir
132321111.content:
Aww, aren't you a cute little buggy~ You heard Gardevoir chime directly into your mind. No, actually you're quite disgusting looking. A sad, small thing writhing between my toes. Ooooo~ I would so love to just crush you like a worm that you are.

This all would've sounded pretty intimidating, if you had any semblence of shame and dignity left. Alas, you've accepted your role as Gardevoir's foot bag, and were open to anything she wished to do with you.

"Please, goddess!" You shouted to the heavens, where only your queen could hear you. "I am here to serve with my body, mind, and soul. If it would please you to squash me like a disgusting bug that I am, then do so."

Ooooo~ Gardevoir cooed, clearly satisfied with your response. How noble of a you, my pathetic, little speck. I think I'll keep you for a bit longer, just to see how far you can go to impress me.

The whole world rumbled around you, as Gardevoir rose the foot you were clinging to, and sent you falling down with a wiggle of her toes. Now, as you sat it the shadow it cast, you were given a good of view of the absolute enormity that was the bottom of goddess' foot. A wide expanse of mostly pristine, white flesh, marred here and there with streaks of sweat, and dirt stains of unknown origins. To you, however, it only added to the appeal of her feet, as did the many ridges, and wrinkles, that were much more distinguishable at your current size.

Suddenly, Gardevoir abruptly kicked her foot towards you. Like a deer caught in the headlights, you watched as her giant heel made its grinding towards you, and it was only due to the mercy of your goddess (and the length of her leg) that she didn't run you over with it. Instead, the giantess settled her foot on the back of its heel, with its sole rising above you like a giant wall.

Here's the task I have for you, my little worm. Climb on my my foot, and lick it clean. Lap that dirt up, from the bottom of my heel, to the tips of my toes. I want it all to shine like your mother's silverware.

This was... a tall order, to say the least. You would have no trouble licking her foot clean, if she just lowered her sole so you could reach it. However, having to get around her foot like a climbing wall in order to clean it posed a much greater challenge. You weren't sure if you were up for it, but you'd be damned if you didn't try.

Taking a deep breath of the rich, pungent scent of her lovely feet, you approached the giantess' heel, ready to get on with your job.
132321111.title: Gardevoir: Lick her giant feet clean

1323211113.content:
"Ooo~, what do we have here~?"

Just as your were about to begin your climb up Gardevoir's foot, your finger almost touching her heel, someone's decided that it was a good time to chime in, and rudely interrupt you...

Ah damn, who were you kidding.

You wanted to sound annoyed by the mysterious stranger's sudden appearance, but in truth you were kinda worried by them. Scared, even. Although you eventually got used to worshipping your Gardevoir's feet, and were now actually quite happy that you could serve her like this, you'd still rather keep that part of your relationship between the two of you. Now that someone else was aware of your subservience to your own Pokemon's feet... It was rather 'uncomfortable', to say the least.

Who was that someone, though? From the sound of their voice, you figured it was probably some female, maybe one of the inn's staff, or perhaps some intrusively curious Pokemon trainer, who lost their way around the place. At any rate, you'd never expect to see another Pokemon standing in the doorway, yet here you were, looking at another Pokemon lady, who stared back at you and Gardevoir. You could tell that she found you two amusing.

The mysterious Pokemon was, in fact, a...
1323211113.title: A second Pokemon joins in

choices: "Let me show you how it's done" Lopunny steps on you
"You'll follow my instructions" Gardevoir steps on you
13232111131.content:
It was a Mega Lopunny!

You've heard of those before, but you've never actually got to see a real one. Lopunnies are rarely used by Pokemon trainers, since it's pretty hard to actually evolve one, and they're not that great at fighting. In contrary, Mega Lopunny is a nearly perfect fighter, able to hit its opponents really hard, and really fast, but its Mega Stone is really hard to come across.

Yet here you were, staring at one of the rarest Pokemon in the world, and a mighty fine specimen at that. Lopunnies, even when Mega evolved, are pretty short by Pokemon standard, yet this one could give even your pretty tall Gardevoir a run for her money. You got a better proof of that, when Gardevoir sternly approached your unexpected visitor, and had to crank her neck up a little to be able to look Lopunny in her scarlet eyes.

"What do you want?" Gardevoir 'spat' out at the Mega. Even though she was talking telephatically to Lopunny, she still allowed you to 'hear' her.

Lopunny didn't seem too bothered by your Pokemon's apparent enmity. In fact, she found her quite cute.
"Aww, why so angry? I'm not here to fight you." The Mega responded, cracking a grin at Gardevoir. "I just saw you two having 'fun', and thought that maybe I could join in. That's all, really~"

"Hah!" Gardevoir let out a haughty laugh, mighty amused by Lopunny's proposition. "Sorry, but I'm not one to share my slaves. I'm afraid you'll have to find your own."

Now it was the rabbit's turn to flaunt, the Mega snickering at Gardevoir's 'advice'.
"Oooo~, but I do have a slave of my own. In fact, he's right here. Say hi to my loyal foot tattoo~"

Suddenly, Lopunny kicked her right leg upwards, almost crashing her paw in your Gardevoir's face, though she stopped herself just in time to leave her padded sole hanging right in front of your Pokemon. At first, Gardevoir took it as a missed attack, and was ready to blow the rabbit away with a Moonblast or some other super effective move. However, as Lopunny continued to stand still in the face of the oncoming attack, only lightly swaying her leg to the left and right, Gardevoir understood that she was in no real danger. Taking a deep breath, she calmed herself down, and focused on the (admittedly pretty nice-looking) paw that the Mega presented to her.

Instantly, she spotted what Lopunny wanted her to see. Spread across the entirety of her main pawpad, was a human. A young man, by the looks of him, dressed in some stylish clothes. However, as she took a better look at him, Gardevoir shockingly noted that the boy wasn't just stuck to his Pokemon's foot. Flat like a sticker, he was firmly ironed to Lopunny's pawpad, effectively becoming her 'foot tattoo', as she herself called him. Though she hated to admit it, Gardevoir was enamored by this sight. A human life whole consumed by his Pokemon's foot, the poor girl couldn't help it but find it incredibly arousing. Against her better judgment, Gardevoir inched her face even closer towards Lopunny's paw, just to get a better look at the 'sticker boy'. As a result, the Mega's pungent foot odour became less tolerable, but nothing she couldn't handle. In fact, it only served to strengthen her arousal, as she imagined how the boy must've felt, his sense of smell literally dominated by the giant Pokemon's foot musk.

As abruptly as she brought her foot up, Lopunny lowered it back to the ground, twisting it left and right a few times for good measure. Looking back at Gardevoir she couldn't help but giggle a little at the sight of her disappointment, the Psychic longingly gazing at the top of her paw, blushing a little at the sight of her four wriggling toes.

"I take it that you liked what you saw, hmm~?" Lopunny asked smugly, confident that she could get Gardevoir to do what she wanted now. The Psychic type shyly nodded in response.
"Would you like to learn, how I did it?" Now the rabbit sounded a bit nicer, taking on a more mentor-y role towards your smaller Pokemon to ease her into agreement.

Before Gardevoir responded, she looked back at you, seeking your approval. To her utter surprise, you were madly blushing, clearly aroused by Lopunny's earlier showcase as well. While Gardevoir imagined how great it would feel to dominate you like this, you thought how it great it would be to become a part of her foot, and have your world be consumed by the scent, and taste, and feel of her dainty, beautiful sole. As a matter of fact, you couldn't think of anything better.

Happy to have you on board, Gardevoir turned around to address Lopunny face to face.

"Yes, I want to know. Please, teach me your ways!" the Psychic exclaimed loudly, so eager to turn you into her little foot sticker. For some wicked reason, you found that incredibly cute... and kinda hot too.

The Mega answered with a big, hearty fit of laughter, very happy to get a positive response from the Psychic type.
"Haha, that's the spirit! How about we get to it right away then?"

Without any objections, the two Pokemon made their way towards the middle of the room, where they would have a lot of space to work with. Once there, Lopunny pointed her finger at you, and said: "Bring him over here, and lay him down by our feet. Where he rightfully belongs~"

Gardevoir did as asked, using her psychic powers to levitate you off the bed, and carefully move you towards the ground at their feet. You watched with mouth agape, as their tall forms towered over your meager self. You already thought of Gardevoir as gigantic back when she was laying down on your bed, but this... Now that she stood above you at her full height, she seemed so impossibly massive. A true goddess, if there ever was one... Even though there were two of them now, with Mega Lopunny looking pretty freaking divine herself from down here.

Looking down at their feet, you noted how Gardevoir's been scrunching her toes in anticipation. Lopunny was more in control of her emotions, slowly drumming her plump, furry tootsies on the floor.

"Now then, let us begin~"
13232111131.title: Mega Lopunny

choices: With some effort, you slowly start to peel away.
You're firmly stuck. The Lopunny tricked her!
132321111311.content:
You watch as the giant, brown paw lifts from the ground, granting you a good view of the sole you're about to get much more familiar with. It advances on you tauntingly slow, the bunny up high wanting to savor watching you disappear beneath it.

As the wide sole is about to eclipse your view of its owner, something slams into you hard from behind, forcing you to the ground. It's immediately clear who the culprit is, you'd recognize that sour aroma anywhere. For some reason, your Gardevoir had pinned you beneath her arch, denying the Lopunny's furry foot its prize. You can hear the two giantesses argue high above you, their voices muffled by the thick, scented flesh of your pokémon's pale foot.

"-was that for?"

"-my trainer! He belongs -"

Was... Gardevoir protecting you? It's hard to imagine, considering she usually treats you like a simple pet... And that's on a good day.

"-show you how to do it! You even -"

"-turn him into my foot tatoo! Not to stick him under -"

You should have figured, she was just scared the Lopunny would steal you away. The argument rages on for a short while longer, but you conclude they've managed to make amends as the Lopunny is still in the room when Gardevoir removes her foot off of you.

"So you're saying it's not permanent?" The psychic giantess sounded disappointed, both giantesses ignoring you as they continue their talk. You know your pokémon is getting agitated at the intruder now, her car-sized foot impatiently tapping away on the ground next to you.

"Well, not at the start. At first he'll be like a sticker, you can peel him off whenever you'd like. But if you leave him stuck there for long enough..."

"Yes?"

The Lopunny grins as she continues teasing the psychic type, enjoying the poor girl's clear desperation of feeling you trapped permanently beneath her dainty foot. "With every step, you'll grind him deeper and deeper into your sole. Until, eventually..." Both giantesses have shifted their full focus back to you, making you squirm pitifully underneath their gaze. The Lopunny grins down at you mischievously while Gardevoir's eyes are wide with anticipation, softly nibbling on her lip at the thought of having you stuck fast against her sole as her toes twitch eagerly against the carpet on either side of you. Her pale, little puppies seemingly can't wait to get a hold of you. Sadly, you'll only be able to grant one of the two beauties its wish. You look longingly at them, wondering which one will end up claiming you as their little prize. "He'll have fully become part of it.", The Mega-Lopunny finishes, causing a small shudder to run along the spine of your aroused partner. "He'll be as impossible to separate from your foot as your actual toes."

"There's no going back?", She hopefully asks.

"There's no going back.", The giant bunny calmly assures her "Once he's progressed far enough, he'll be stuck as your little insole forever~"

"Do it. Show me"

The rabbit's brown paw lifts again, balancing on her heel as her toes wiggle in anticipation, excited to feel your tiny body beneath them.

"You're sure this time?"

"Yes..."

"Alrighty then. Get Ready little human, time for the big bunny to show you where you belong~"

Her foot advances on you again, slowly blocking out your view of first its owner at first, and then hiding your Gardevoir behind it as well, demanding your full attention. The toes pass you completely, leaving your head in the middle of her main paw pad, the rest of your body trailing down along her sole, with your feet stopping just above her heel. The brown paw hangs precariously over you, close enough for you to count the individual strands of its fur. You can't help but breathe deeply of oppressive stench washing over you. It's certainly very different from what you're used too. While Gardevoir's foot stink smelled more sharply like vinegar, this Loppuny's musk seems much more potent. Earthy, stale and heavy as if it made the air itself weigh more, you were already being dominated by the foot before it even touched you.

With the rabbits sole completely filling your view, you immediately see a downside of the Pokémon turning that other person into a tattoo instead of a servant. Her foot is disgustingly filthy. Clumps of dried sweat and grime cover most of the sole, it's clearly not been cleaned any time recent. Gardevoir's conditioning makes you feel pained by the sorry state of the neglected sole. Almost instinctively, you hold out your arms and prepare your tongue to give the poor thing its sorely needed pampering.

At last it came down, slowly, gently settling down on top of your body. Your stretched arms prove no match as it effortlessly pushes them back down, leaving you with a twinge of regret as you were unable to serve the great furry paw as it deserved. You feel its filth slither up against your body, finding its way into your clothes as the grimy pad molds itself approvingly against your face.

"The hardest bit is not squishing them by accident", the rabbit educates your pokémon, uncaring of your plight beneath her. "It's a pain to clean their remains off of your foot, and you'll need to go out and find another toy if you do". You quietly scoff at the implication this Lopunny has ever cleaned her paw of anything as you lap at her pad, adamant to polish the small area you can reach at least. "In order to avoid that, I tend to use some combination of moves to raise their defense like so"

As she said that, you can feel your skin and muscles contract and tighten. It's making you itch all over, your skin slowly losing its flexibility as it turns hard as steel.

"Now he should be able to withstand pretty much anything I throw at him, which means I don't have to be as gentle anymore, see?" You knew it was coming, but nothing could have prepared you for the massive weight suddenly forced down on you. You even heard Gardevoir gasp as the oppressive sole relentlessly crushed you beneath it. You feel it bend around you, the filthy thing seeming to swallow you up within it. You are submerged in complete darkness as you feel her foot settle on the ground around you, leaving you in complete darkness as the only defiant little pebble to deny her sole its passage to the floor. For now.

"Now we just wait. The defense enhancements from earlier will slowly start to wear off, gradually letting my paw squish him flat." The Lopunny simply continues her lesson, talking about you as if you weren't even there! After giving it some thought, you suppose it would be odd if she did care about the feelings of someone she's turning into a little foot sticker. "We just need to make sure to heal him from time to time. His crushed body will then mend itself within the ever shrinking space available to it until he ends up flat as a pancake!" The giant rabid excitedly exclaims. "All you need then is patience for your foot to accept its little treat while you grind him into your sole with every step you take."

It didn't take long for the Lopunny's prediction to come true. Slowly, your body relaxes again, buckling under her oppressive weight. Your breathing becomes more labored as her foot mercilessly crushes your chest. You can feel her sole sinking into you, as if you were an inflatable mattress leaking out its air.

As you lay there, helplessly suckling on the rabbit's foot flesh, you start to become acutely aware of every single one of her foot's motions. Every clench and flex of her toes, every slight shift in posture to keep her balance. Eventually, you even experience its tactile sensations, her big fuzzy toes gleefully rubbing together feeling as if they were lovingly cradling your face between them.

"Hmm... I think he's ready" With a flex of her powerful muscles, you feel yourself rise, stuck firmly to the Lopunny's sole like a wad of gum. With your face plastered against her sole, you're pretty much flying blind, forced to rely on the little input you get from your now exposed back, as well as the rest of the dominant paw. With a jerk, you feel yourself stop. "How does he look~?" You assume the giant rabbit is showing you off to Gardevoir. You're proven correct as you soon feel your pokémon's breath on your back, ruffling the fur between the Mega-evolution's toes as it blows through them.

"A-Amazing... He's really stuck there like a lost, little bug"

You can feel your Gardevoir's breath getting heavier, no doubt she's getting flustered by imagining you stuck fast to her own sole. You slowly feel her psychic power building near one of your arms, looking to peel you off the bunny's foot so she can try you out herself.
132321111311.title: "Let me show you how it's done" Lop...

choices: Shrink Gardevoir down, and turn her into another foot tattoo
Leave Gardevoir, and go look for some other human to dominate
1323211113112.content:
No matter how hard she tried, Gardevoir simply couldn't free you from the tight hold Lopunny's paw had over your body. She pulled at you with the most powerful Psychic she could muster, but you wouldn't budge an inch. You were firmly stuck in it, consumed by the furry Pokemon's sweltering pawpad like the many clumps of first and grime that coated its vast surface. You yourself made an effort to assist your Pokemon in her endeavor, but seemingly to no avail. You tried to push, pry, wriggle yourself free, but you were too far gone into it to at this point made any significant difference. Worse still, being stuck face first into her dirty paw, with your body semi-squished flat like it was, it made you feel very weak, hopeless, and completely at the mercy of the overbearing foot's unsettling owner.

Tired of her fer fruitless attempts at getting you back, Gardevoir finally snapped in anger at the Mega, who stood above her all tall'n'mighty-like.

"Hey! I can't get him off your smelly paw! Help me right this instant, or else!"

Lopunny merely smirked smugly at the Psychic Fairy sitting at her feet, enjoying how cute Gardevoir looked when she was angry.

"Haaa~ Fine, fine. I'll get to it. Just try to take a hold of his body, and I'll take care of the rest."

With an annoyed groan, your Pokemon did what was asked of her, and pinched your body as tightly as she could, while her other hand grabbed Lopunny's ankle. From your current position you could hear your Gardevoir dissatisfied mumbling. She clearly didn't like the idea of getting her hands anywhere near Lopunny's putrid paws, something even a foot enthusiast like yourself couldn't really blame her for.

"You ready?"

"Yes. Let's get this over with."

"Alright then. Here. I..."

Suddenly, Lopunny's leg lurched backward, taking the unprepared Gardevoir with is, and slamming her face into the Mega's stinky sole, and your body that was stuck to it.

"GO!"

The rabbit giantess then kicked her foot forward, crashing it into the defenseless, disoriented Psychic type's face, before carrying it all the way to the ground, and ending with a powerful, brutal stomp. Your Pokemon was left knocked out on the floor, at the mercy of the cruel Lopunny's wicked whims. The Mega didn't waste any time literally rubbing her victory into the Fairy's face, as she gleefully grinded the dirt and sweat off her foot into Gardevoir's once pristine face. Of course, she used the paw that you were stuck to, finding it delightfully ironic.

You didn't know exactly what happened, but from the sounds alone you were able to tell that it meant nothing good for you, or your Pokemon. Once again you tried fighting back against the Mega's oppressive sole, but your struggles were for naught. All the kicking, and stomping, and grinding underfoot that the sadistic rabbit subjected your Gardevoir to, also served to iron you even further into her sweaty pawpad. With every second you were getting flatter, stickier, more and more inseparable from Lopunny's grimy, sweaty foot, something she couldn't get enough of.

"Ahhh~ How I love the feeling of little, worthless humans getting gradually more stuck to my perfect feet. It's been sooooo long since I did that to my trainer, I almost forgot what a joy it was to experience. Oh, I need more of it, more of you pathetic things squirming at my feet. Where could I find another victim, though?"

While Lopunny thought of her next course of action, she inadvertently began tapping one of her feet. Surprise surprise, it was the one you were stuck to. Predictably, it only served to further drive you into her putrid pawpad, and squish your body into the foot tattoo that she wanted you to become. You didn't know how much time you had left before you became a permanent smear on her sole, but it couldn't be much at this point.

As she continued to think what to do next, Lopunny's eyes once again fell on Gardevoir's unconscious form. Then, as she began to absentmindedly rub one of her toes on the Psychic Fairy's lips, the Mega suddenly came up with an idea, and a delightfully malevolent one at that. While she preferred her slaves to be human, a humanoid Pokemon like Gardevoir could almost pass for one of those pathetic things. In fact, this one already got on her nerves, to the point where she wouldn't really mind seeing her be put in her place, right underneath Lopunny's superior, smelly paws. Besides, if she were to leave that Psychic alone, she would definitely come looking for her little slave, and the big, bad bunny that kidnapped him. Getting rid of her right now would definitely save the Mega some trouble in the future

The clock was ticking, and Mega Lopunny had to make her choice. What does she end up doing?
1323211113112.title: The Lopunny's Deception

choices: Gardevoir wakes up on Lopunny’s paw
Lopunny takes time to enjoy the current slaves under her paws

The Lopunny, deciding to deal with Gardevoir here and now decides to shrink Gardevoir down and make her another one of her foot tattoos. A purple glow surrounds the unconscious Gardevoir and she slowly starts shrinking down until she’s only 2 inches. After that the Mega Lopunny began the whole foot tattoo process that she did on you just minutes prior.

After sticking Gardevoir to her smelly paw she began looking around for another pathetic human to turn into a worthless foot slave

choices: After a LOT of effort, Gardevoir managed to peel you off...
No such luck, you were stuck for good...
13232111131123.content:
Sadly, Mega Lopunny never got to make her choice.

Beneath her dirty, smelly paw, Gardevoir's crimson eyes opened as she regained consciousness.

A blurry cream-colored figure appeared in her sight, before her vision cleared and the dirty paw-pad of Lopunny, the person she wanted to render her foot-tattoo (as well as her former trainer) stuck into it, filled it.

Gardevoir gritted her teeth, some of the dirt of the paw rolling into her partially open mouth as the bunny fidgeted her paw.

Hastily, Gardevoir rose both her paws from the ground, gripping Lopunny's ankle.

The bunny only had time to gasp in surprise before Gardevoir stood up, throwing the Mega Lopunny off her.

The long-eared pokemon fell on her rear end, her whole body shaking while causing you to vibrate against the filthy pad.

"Gardevoir!" you shouted, or at least tried to, since your mouth was glued to the dirty pad.

For less than a second, you felt the pressure around you relieved, but you couldn't tell why. Though, it wasn't hard to figure out judging by Lopunny's scream,

"Oh!" she exclaimed, looking up at the seething Gardevoir who stood up, removing the dirt from her face and glaring down at the Mega Lopunny.

"Hehe~ whoops!" she said innocently, before her paws connected with the ground; her legs rose high in the air before Lopunny pushed herself up, both her legs aiming at Gardevoir.

This time, both her feet connected with your poor pokemon's chest as she was hit while you were shoved deeper into your cruel, smelly entrapment.

Lopunny finally landed, your dazed pokemon stumbled back, all the air knocked out of her lungs by the sheer force of the dual kick.

When she finally regained the ability to speak, Gardevoir snarled.

"... You tricked me!" she stated the obvious.

Lopunny smirked.

"Why of course~! Couldn't resist the idea of a second foot-tattoo~" she sang mischievously, before lifting her leg, whose foot you were stuck to, and trying to kick Gardevoir again.

This time, the foot never landed on your pokemon; instead, it stopped at several inches from her face, held by psychic.

Before Lopunny could process what was going on, she was thrown backwards by the psychic/fairy-type's mind power.

The bunny was slammed into a tree, then levitated up in mid-air.

Once she reached a decent height, Gardevoir let go of her.

For a moment, her mind saw the brown/cream bunny crashing to the ground, but then her mouth hung open as the Mega Lopunny suddenly readjusted in mid-air and performed Jump Kick, hitting Gardevoir in the face again.

Your pokemon felt sick, some of the dirt of the cream paw ended up in her mouth, your flat form helplessly slid against her white face.

‘Disgusting!’ she thought, feeling her consciousness fading once again.

Luckily, she managed to hang on.

And, when Lopunny was about to dish out another kick with her powerful legs, Gardevoir hit the normal/fighting-type with a super-effective Moonblast, which had the effect of making the overgrown rabbit fall to the ground once again.

Meanwhile, you were suffering hell. Each time Lopunny hit Gardevoir or vice versa, you were forced deeper into the smelly pad by the vibrations.

Even worse, you had managed to open your mouth to scream, but it was invaded by the Lopunny's foot-flesh and was violated by the disgusting filth that was stuck to it.

Again, you were subjected to an immense pressure as Lopunny stood back up.

The two fighting pokemon, they walked in circles for a few moments, before Gardevoir's opponent tried to attack again, but again the psychic-type used her mind power to grip Lopunny's whole leg and lifted her in the air, spun her around before she threw her like a javelin.

And, just like a javelin, Lopunny landed head-first on the ground, her head hitting the roots of a large tree.

The bunny didn't get up after that. As a matter of fact, she didn't move at all.

Understanding that her opponent had finally fainted, Gardevoir rushed to her feet, which were laying limp on the grass.

Ignoring Lopunny's first foot-tattoo, Gardevoir moved to you.

You were surrounded by a cyan light as the giantess performed Pyschic on you and started pulling, trying to peel you off Lopunny's foot.

This was her chance to leave the bunny and avoid further conflict, Gardevoir figured out, but she needed her former trainer first.

The first few pulls had no effect aside from making you scream in pain, your skin stuck to Lopunny's like glue.

You tried to move your arms and legs to ease Gardevoir's task (whatever she had planned for you, it was going to be better than this for sure).

But as time drew on without any noticeable results, you quickly understood that you were stuck into the paw-pad even more than you or Gardevoir had thought.

"Come on, come on..." Gardevoir whispered nervously as she pulled with Psychic once more.

She had to be quick: Lopunny wasn't going to stay unconscious for long.
13232111131123.title: Attempting to fight back

choices: "Have you already thought of what to do? I have an advice." the Weavile said
"Yeah, he's yours... but not for long." the Weavile snatched you and fled!
13232111133.content:
The blood froze in your veins.

Standing by the doorway, was the slim figure of a dark-furred pokemon with clawed paws and, most importantly, clawed feet.

A Weavile.

Gardevoir stared at the smaller pokemon, seemingly taken aback by the sudden apparition.

All while the same Weavile stared straight at you, deeply intrigued by the fact she was staring at a shrunken human.

Gardevoir was the first to recover from the surprise,

"Who... Who are you? What are you doing here... I'm kinda busy." she said; despite the annoying fact you couldn't understand your own pokemon, you noted that she was making no attempt to conceal the hostility in her voice.

The Weavile's gaze lingered on you for a couple more moments, causing you to feel more and more uncomfortable under the weight of her crimson eyes, before shooting Gardevoir a smirk.

"Just passing by, when I noticed you and this totally amusing little... thing," the weasel chimed smugly as she walked inside the room, stopping right in front of you, the tip of her claw dangerously close to your neck.

"Yeah. My little thing," Gardevoir clarified possessively, earning another smirk from the intruder.

Other than that, the dark-type seemed to ignore your pokemon completely; her foot suddenly rose above you, you following its arising with your eyes.

A shadow fell over you, the sight of the Weavile's towering sole eclipsing your view.

With a hint of disgust, you noted that it was covered in dirt, dust and crushed grass, perhaps collected from the floor of the inn and from wherever this Weavile, presumably trained, had been walking.

And then, you randomly remembered about what Gardevoir had been doing to you during the past hour, and it struck you; the Weavile wanted to-

"N-"

You couldn't finish your pleading, because, under Gardevoir's eyes, the clawed foot came down on you, the dirty sole pushing you to the floor, covering your whole body but your head, which was stuck in between two of her toes.

A strong, horrible smell reigned in your current location, but you didn't dare to move lest one of the very sharp claws could end up killing you effortlessly.

The dark-type giantess snickered as she began rubbing her foot on you, some of the dirt moving from her sole to your body as the large paw started grinding you into the floor.

The Weavile kept snickering as you were assaulted by the strong feeling that you were going to end up as the dust under her feet if you didn't do something fast. And the smell was quite certainly not getting any better; it stung your nose, causing you to cough as the foot kept fidgeting on top of your helpless, shrunken form, coating your body on dirt.

If your hands were free, you would have at least covered your nose to keep the smell out of your lungs.

But you discovered that you got used to it pretty fast, given how your lungs were being crushed; since you currently had no other source of respiration, you had to resign yourself to the humiliating task of having to breath in the disgusting smell of the Weavile's foot.

Noticing your completely grossed-out expression, the giantess snickered, seeming to be enjoying your time under her foot... and she hadn't even begun!

Gardevoir watched all of this happening in shock.

But it didn't take long before she recovered; as soon as it began, your smelly torture ended as the foot abruptly pulled away from you.

It lingered in mid-air for a couple moments as the Weavile stumbled back, before her foot landed, shaking the floor beneath you.

You urgently realized that Gardevoir just tugged on the weasel's arm and pulled her away.

You mentally thanked her, and the slightest hint of a smile appeared on her face, before she frowned.

"Didn't you hear me?" she asked, and you could tell by her expression that she was seething,

"He's mine."

Her glare would have caused the majority of pokemon to back off at this point, but not the Weavile.

The ice/dark-type simply snickered as she responded,
13232111133.title: The Weasel in the inn

1323212.content:
After she wiped her sweaty feet off, using your face as a doormat, the real torture began.

Her eyes narrowed and shown pink with energy. You could feel your limbs contort down behind you, essentially turning you into a pretzel with no hope of fighting back. Then She leaned forward and squished your face to pucker your lips. You dare not un-pucker them for fear of the pain she could easily put you through. So you closed your eyes in silent dread of the treatment you were to give to her feet.

"Hee hee..." you heard her giggle.

She obviously expected more...

You open your eyes and see her toes, arches, and heels moving to different positions with each kiss. The smell was still lingering too, as when you kissed the soles or heels of her feet, the toes or arches would rub your nose.

1331.title: Gothita

1332.content:
The moon glared down on you as you walk through the woods. You didn't want to be out here, but you had lost your pokedex during a battle earlier and you didn't notice until you had gotten to a pokemon center and dropped your team off. The woods around you become more and more eerie with every step you take.

You freeze. The footfalls you heard ever so softly stop as well. You peer around you, searching for what made them.

When you look fully behind you, you can barely make out the figure of a pokemon between the bushes. You take out your dex to identify it.

Gothorita- the manipulation pokemon

"They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner."

The horror creeps over you as your eyes meet with the ones coming from the bushes. The Gothorita's eyes glowed blue before you lost control of your limbs.
1332.title: Gothorita

choices: "You should start your new life off by cleaning the soles of my feet!"
"I'll take you back home with me so that we can have a little fun!"
13322.content:
For a moment, you were able to do nothing but stand there in horror. The psychic goth pokemon had taken complete control over your body, and you were now utterly helpless. Just as you were realizing that you were totally at her mercy, the Gothorita that had you trapped began using her psychic powers to speak into your mind.

"Well, well, well... What do we have here? A little human has decided that they have the right to trespass on MY turf? I must say, human, you're the first in a long time to be foolish enough to invade my territory. What do you have to say for yourself?"

You gulp in fear as you begin to respond. She seemed really irritated with you, and a powerful psychic pokemon like her could easily make your life into a nightmare.

"P-please Miss Gothorita, I never intended to trespass anywhere! I just dropped something of mine around here earlier, so I had to come back and get it. I was already leaving, so please don't hurt me!"

The psychic goth simply smirked mischievously at you.

"Well little human, I can't just let your little crime go unpunished, can I? I think that you need to learn your lesson now, otherwise you'll think that it's perfectly okay to invade my turf in the future!"

"What?! But I didn't even mean to-"

Your words were cut off as the Gothorita used her psychic powers to force your mouth shut. You could only whimper in fear as she walked right up next to you and gave you a light shove. Normally you could have easily caught yourself, but Gothorita's psychic powers had your entire body paralyzed. She simply giggled at you as she watched your body collapse backward and fall to the ground. She then stepped forward until her petite figure was standing right on top of your chest. You could only watch in horror as the psychic goth sat down on top of you and ran one of her hands down the side of your cheek. Giggling deviously, Gothorita spoke into your mind once again.

"Now then, I think that I have just the thing in mind to punish a foolish little human like you."

Just then, the blue glow in her eyes vanished. You immediately attempted to move, but you found that you were still frozen in place. Just then, Gothorita's eyes began glowing bright red. Suddenly, you started feeling the weight of Gothorita's body becoming slightly heavier. As you stared up at her in fear, you saw that she was slowly beginning to grow bigger!

However, as you looked around, you saw that this wasn't exactly the case. Everything around you was growing as well, which could only mean one thing: You were shrinking! Soon, Gothorita's light weight was becoming far too much for you to endure. Just as you thought that you were going to be crushed beneath the psychic goth's rear end, she stood up and stepped off of you. You were now able to breath freely once again, but the sight of the towering goth pokemon was becoming terrifying. Within mere moments, you had been reduced to only 1 inch tall! At that point, your shrinking stopped, and Gothorita reached down to pick you up.

With another mischievous smile, she spoke into your mind again.

"Alright little human, I think that this size is much more fitting for you! From now on, you belong to me! You should get used to it quick, because you'll never escape from me. Now, I think that..."
13322.title: Time for your punishment!

133221.content:
"...you shall clean my feet thoroughly before we go any farther. Walking the forest floor has been all but kind to my precious footsies, and what better way to rejuvenate them than to be cleaned?"

Gothorita's grin only widened as your jaw dropped. She squeezed you lightly it seemed to her, but for your size it felt like a boa constrictor. In a panic you bit down hard between her hand and her thumb.

"YEE! Ow, vile HUMAN!" Gothorita hissed in a rage.

She threw you violently in a rage straight at the ground at her feet. You hardly had time to think before she lifted her foot high above you, and brought it crashing down. The sole completely enveloped your body, and the only action possibly was to smell her giant foot, which was difficult in itself because of the pressure. It wasn't long before she started grinding you into the dirt and grass. Unbeknownst to you, Gothorita was using her psychic abilities to also keep you alive to endure more torture, at least until she was done with you...

The loli pokemon was far from done. After rubbing you with the bottom of her foot, she rolled you up under her toes and proceded to grind and crush even harder. Being between her toes created immense pressure from every angle. After she was done with her revenge, she slowly lifted her dark grey foot up, with you limply mashed on the bottom of it.

"ahHAhaha, that is just repulsive! Im must say though, a human has never looked so good."

The Gothorita's smile curled devilishly.

"Now, little slave, time to get to the cleaning..."

The Gothorita placed the foot with you on it down, pressing you back into the grass. Then she wiped her foot off on the ground, leaving you face up and in a daze. She then took her other foot and wiped the grime off on you with it till she was satisfied.
133221.title: "You should start your new life off by clea...

choices: "You get my sister's feet as well"
1332212.content:
You cough and try to move.

No luck, she's still got you paralyzed.

The Gothorita bent down to pick you up. As soon as you were in her grasp, pain shocked your body. Despite her keeping you alive, the gargantuan sized pokemon's trampling has definitely taken it's toll. She isn't even squeezing roughly and you are still just barely conscious. You can no longer think straight as the Gothorita takes you deeper into the woods. The trees whip by you in a daze. You finally reach another clearing in the woods with short grass, beautiful flowers, and a stump dead in the center. Moonlight bathed the entire area, which you could see now that your head was starting to clear. The Gothorita walked briskly to the stump in the clearing, and sat on top of it. She held her palm flat, and brought you to her face, glaring at you with a sour expression.

With much effort, you tried to talk to her once again.

"P-pleease...COUGH... I-I-I just...Not all humans are bad, I mean you must have met SOME kind ones COUGH...Please find it in yourself...HACK...to let...COUGH...me go free"

Her eyes narrowed. She frowned and pursed her lips before speaking

"You must think humans did something cruel to me in my life. What a silly gesture, I've never been inside a pokeball. While I do particularly hate humans I enjoy torturing smaller pokemon as well. Something about watching them suffer, and not having the ability to escape, makes me aroused..."

She started tipping her outstretched palm towards the ground, allowing you to slip off. You hit the rough grass hard and yell out in pain. This made the Gothorita smile. Then, all you could see were her feet.

Your faced was pressed up against her footflesh. It squished around your entire body and covered you in sweat. It wasn't long till you realized you couldn't breath. She was smothering you underneath her feet, and she didn't care if you lived or died. As your oxygen ran short you tried squirming more and more. There was no way out unless the Gothorita willed it. She cupped you under both feet, making the smell unbearable. You could see the dark grey soles of her feet wrinkle above you. Then she set them back down on your body, cutting off you air supply again.

This game continued for way too long. You are smothered by Gothorita's sweat covered and stinky feet until she lets you breath for a couple seconds. Then it gets worse when she starts to rub you slowly up and down with both feet, completely covering you in grime.

That nasty grin grows back on her face as she says to you, "If you don't want to die I suggest... "
